gbɔn nɛ e
mi ni kpɔn akpa e biblu do lɛ e
fifa na kpacɛ ɖo ahwan sin tɛnmɛ
jehovah na su ahwan kun do gbɔn gbɛ ɔ bi mɛ
e wɛn ga lɛ e lɔ hwan lɛ
adɔ sɔ na ɖe a ɖo nuɖuɖu na tunfla
ji n a jɛ ɖo to ɔ mɛ kaka bo tunfla
atin sinsɛn n a bla ta nu so lɛ ðɛhan
zaanɖe din ɔ jezu na vɔ nu e wezun sɔxatɔ atɔn ɖe lɛ tɔn hɛn gble lɛ e bloɖo
azɔn kpo ku kpo sɔ na ɖe a ɖo mɛ bi na ɖu vivi lanmɛ syɛn hunsin ɖagbe kpo gbɛ mavɔmavɔ kpo tɔn
mawu na sunsun ɖasin bi sin nukun yetɔn mɛ ku sɔ na tiin a aluwɛ sɔ na tiin a alenina sɔ na tiin a wuvɛ mimɔ sɔ na tiin a nuɖexlɛmɛ
hwenu e jezu ɖo ayikungban ji e ɔ e ɖe lee ninɔmɛ lɛ na ci ɖo acɛkpikpa tɔn glɔ e xlɛ sɔ akpakpa mɛ tawun
e jɛhun do fifa ji blo nujiwu do na nuɖuɖu gbɛtɔ afatɔn mɔkpan gbɔ azɔn nu mɛ lɛ bo tlɛ fɔn mɛ sin ku matie jaan
kunnuɖetɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ na hun xomɛ do xlɛ we lee a sixu ɖo gbesisɔmɛ hwenu e sɔxatɔ lɛ sin wezun na fo do e ɖo biblu towe mɛ
a ka na yi gbe bo na kplɔn nu a
mawu sin nyikɔ wɛ nɔ nyi jehovah ɖo biblu mɛ
nuɖexlɛmɛ
mɛ e ɖo kunkun wɛ e nɔte nu jezu klisu
e jɛ axɔsu ɖu ji ɖo bɔ zaanɖe din ɔ e na ɖu bi mlɛmlɛ bo na ɖe wuvɛ mimɔ bi siin
nuɖexlɛmɛ
mɛ e ɖo kunkun wɛ e nɔte nu ahwan
wɛkɛ hwan lɛ kpo ahwan kpɛvi kpɛvi lɛ kpo ko hu gbɛtɔ maxamaxa lɛ sin
nuɖexlɛmɛ
mɛ e ɖo kunkun wɛ e nɔte nu adɔ
adɔ ko gble gbɛ do nu gbɛtɔ livi mɔkpan
nuɖexlɛmɛ

yɔdo ɖo gbɛtɔ lɛ bɛ kple wɛ
e wlan nyikɔ tattannu ɔ ɖo zɛnxwɛ elɔ sin to lɛ ɖokpo
dobanunu dokunkun tɔn sin kunnuɖenu ɖe ka nɔ gudo nu nu e ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e a
ðo ɔ xojlawema biblical archaeology review sin xota ɖe kan nu elɔ byɔ mɛ ɖeɖee xo e ɖɔ ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e nabi dobanunu dokunkun tɔn ka ɖekunnu na
xosin e e na e ɖie e hwe bi ɔ gbɛtɔ
mɛ e sin nyikɔ ma ɖo nyikɔ ɖeɖee xota ɔ slɛ lɛ e mɛ a e ɖokpo wɛ nyi tatunayi
mɛ wɛ e ka nyi
mi nu mi ni kpɔn nu e e wa bɔ biblu ɖɔ e klewun
jeluzalɛmu ko nɔ acɛkpikpa pɛsinu lɛ tɔn glɔ kpɔn
toxo ɔ ɖo fi e pɛsinu lɛ nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ tɔ ɔ gudo e e wɛ nyi eflati tɔ ɔ sin gbadahweji
ee pɛsinu lɛ ɖu ɖo babilɔnu ji gudo e ɔ ye ɖe jwifu e nyi kannumɔ lɛ e nyite bo na gbe ye ɖɔ ye ni yi vɔ tɛmpli jehovah tɔn gba ɖo jeluzalɛmu
ɛsidlasi amɔ kɛntɔ jwifu lɛ tɔn lɛ klan gbe xa ye ɖo azɔ enɛ wu lobo gbɔn yɛkan enɛ mɛ bo dohwɛ ye ɖɔ ye fɔn gu do acɛkpikpa pɛsi tɔn ji
ɛsidlasi ðo axɔsuɖuɖu daliwusi i tɔn hwenu ɔ j h m axɔsuzɔwatɔ pɛsinu e nɔ nyi tatunayi e ba do nu xo ɔ
biblu ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ tokpɔngan tatunayi e ɖo eflati tɔ ɔ sin gbadahweji e ɛsidlasi
e kun zɛnxwɛ e ji nyikɔ tatunayi ɖe e gege sin do glɔ bɔ e ci ɖɔ xwedo ɖe wɛ sɛ ye xwe ɖɔhun
zɛnxwɛ ɖe ɖo zɛnxwɛ lɛ mɛ bo xlɛ ɖɔ kancica ɖe nɔ hagbɛ xwedo ɔ tɔn ɖe kpo mɛ e xo ɖɔ wɛ mi ɖe e kpo tɛntin
nuwlanwlan akpadido tɔn ɖe wɛ ɖo zɛnxwɛ ɔ ji bɔ e wlan ɖo j h m ɖo axɔsuɖuɖu daliwusi i tɔn sin xwe ɔ mɛ
e ɖexlɛ ɖɔ mɛ e nɔ akpadido ɔ tɛnmɛ e ɖe nyi mɛsɛntɔ nu tattannu tokpɔngan tɔ ɔ gudo tɔn tatunayi ɖokpo ɔ e xo e ɖɔ ɖo wema ɛsidlasi tɔn mɛ ɖo biblu mɛ e wɛ
etɛ nya enɛ ka wa
ðo j h m ɔ silusi daxo ɔ vɔ fi e e gbɔn lɛ e to bo ma ye bɔ tokpɔn enɛ lɛ ɖokpo wɛ e ylɔ ɖɔ babilɔnu kpo tɔ ɔ gudo kpo
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e wa ma tokpɔn ɔ ɖo we bɔ e ylɔ ɖokpo ɖɔ tɔ ɔ gudo kpowun
libaan tɔdo mɛ fenisii samalii kpo judaa kpo ɖo tokpɔn enɛ mɛ bɔ e ci ɖɔ damasi wɛ tokpɔngan ɔ nɔ nɔ ɖɔhun
tatunayi do tokpɔn enɛ ji ɖo jɛ j h m mɔ
ee tatunayi yi jeluzalɛmu bo yi ba do nu gufinfɔn sin hwɛ e e do jwifu lɛ e gudo e ɔ e ɖo gbe nu daliwusi ɖɔ jwifu lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ silusi wɛ na gbe emi ɖɔ emi ni vɔ tɛmpli jehovah tɔn gba
do e e ba nu nu ɖo nu xoxo sɛxwetɛn hɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ e nɔ gudo nu xo enɛ

enɛ wu ɔ un gbɛ

e blawu ɖɔ un nɔ lɛ zan gbɛ blibli

amɔ ee un ɖo xwe e ɔ un gblewu ɖaxo ɖe hwenu e un ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ba wli balɔɔn ɖo balɔɔn xixo ɖe hwenu e
ee e kpɔn te nu mi gudo e ɔ un jo balɔɔnxixozɔ ɔ do

ðo ɔ un yi gbe bo yi kpleɖokpɔ ɖaxo kunnuɖetɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn ɖe

nu e un kplɔn ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e gege jiwu nu mi
ði kpɔndewu ɔ jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ na jla axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbɔn gbɛ ɔ bi mɛ

amɔ e byɔ hwenu cobɔ un wa kpewu
ði kpɔndewu nu xwe gege ɔ un nɔ nyi akɔ do animɛloo e un nɔ do ba taɖagbe na e ɖo aklunɔzan gbla lɛ bi mɛ ɖo ɖogowungbaxwe to ɔ tɔn

un sɔ nyi akɔ ɖe kpɔn gbeɖe a

e ɖɔ nu mi kpo akpakpa sɔ mɛ kpo ɖɔ e ya sammy wa mi ni ɖu gbɛ

amɔ un byɔ xɔ ce mɛ xwɛlɛɛ bo su hɔn do ta
egbe ɔ xomɛ hun mi ɖɔ sin hwenu e un huzu kunnuɖetɔ ɖe ɖo e ɔ un tɛ do huzuhuzu ɖeɖee un blo ɖo gbɛzan ce mɛ lɛ e wu kpo gbejininɔ kpo
alixlɛmɛ biblu tɔn xwixwedo hɛn le wa nu mi kaka bɔ nu un kpewu wɛ ɔ un na wlan ye do wema ɖokpo mɛ
le enɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ un ɖo xɔntɔn jɔ xɔntɔn gege gbɛzan e ɖo nu e ɖe kpo awajijɛ nujɔnu tɔn kpo
un kpo ɖo baseball sin vivi ɖu wɛ amɔ un vɔ nu e nɔ mya nukun nu mi lɛ e gbeje kpɔn
baseball hɛn akwɛ kpo susu kpo wa nu mi amɔ nu enɛ lɛ nɔ ayi kaka ɖe a
loɔ kancica e ɖo nyi kpo mawu kpo kpodo kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn e mɛ un ɖe e kpo tɛntin e na nɔ ayi kaka sɔyi
biblu ɖɔ gbɛ elɔ ɔ wiwa yi wɛ e ɖe bɔ mɛ e nɔ blo jlo gbɛ elɔ tɔn lɛ lɔ ɖo wiwa yi wɛ mɛ e nɔ blo jlo mawu tɔn ɔ ka nɔ nɔ gbɛ kaka sɔyi
ði nu ye ðɔhun sala
sala ci te ɖo xɔ ɔ tɛntin bo nɔ nyi nukun kpɔn nu e lɛlɛ do e lɛ e
do nukun mɛ bo kpɔn nyɔnu gbadahweji azii tɔn tɔn ɖe ɖo nukun cɔɔn
aluwɛ ɖe wɛ ka ɖo nukun tɔn ta a
e ka nyi mɔ hun nu e wu wɛ e ɖo wɛn
nu gege wɛ jɛ ɖo xwe enɛ gbe
e kpo asu vivɛna tɔn ablaxamu kpo ko nɔ awajijɛ mɛ ɖo finɛ nu xwe mɔkpan
ye wa nu ɖo kpɔ bo sɔ finɛ do ɖo xwe yetɔn
ye nɔ wuu toxo nukunɖeji ɖe wɛ bɔ alɔnuzɔwatɔ lɛ kpo ajɔtɔ lɛ kpo gɔ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ye na ko ɖo nuɖokan gege
amɔ xwe sala tɔn xɔ akwɛ hu fi e e na bɛ nuɖokan tɔn lɛ ɖo kpowun e
finɛ wɛ e kpo asu tɔn kpo mɔ awajijɛ gege kpo wuvɛ gege kpo ɖe
finɛ wɛ ye xoɖɛ azɔn mɔkpan sɛdo jehovah mawu e ye yi wan na e ɖe
sala ɖo hwɛjijɔ e zɔn bɔ e na yi wan nu fi enɛ e gege
e ɖo mɔ co sala ɖo gbesisɔmɛ bo na jo nu e ko ma do e lɛ e bi do
e na ko ɖo xwe mɔ co e na sɛ tɛn yi fi e e ma tuun a lɛ e lobo na zan gbɛ e awovinu kpodo wuvɛ mimɔ kpo gɔ e ɖe nukunɖiɖo ɖe ka ɖe ɖɔ e na lɛkɔ gbe ɖokpo a
etɛ ka sisɛ ɛ bɔ e blo huzuhuzu ɖaxo enɛ ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ
etɛ nuɖiɖi tɔn ka sixu kplɔn mi ɖo egbe
wuu wɛ sala na ko su ɖe
egbe ɔ aglingbigba kɛɖɛ wɛ kpo ɖo toxo enɛ mɛ
amɔ ɖo sala sin hwenu ɔ tɔjihun ajɔtɔ lɛ tɔn lɛ wɛ nɔ gbɔn eflati tɔ ɔ ji bo nɔ hɛn ajɔnu xɔ akwɛ lɛ sin fi linlin lɛ wa toxo hun nukun enɛ mɛ
mɛ lɛ nɔ gɔ ali gɔndɔngɔndɔn wuu tɔn lɛ ji tɔjihun lɛ nɔ yeɖee ɖo tɔjihunglintɛn lɛ bɔ ajɔnu e ye hɛn wa lɛ e nɔ gɔ axi lɛ mɛ
do nukun mɛ bo kpɔn hwenu e sala ɖo susu wɛ ɖo toxo ɖaxo enɛ mɛ kaka bo wa tuun mɛ e lɛ e gege sin nyikɔ e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ye lɔ na ko flin i ɖo nyɔnu ɖe wɛ e nyi bo nyɔ ɖɛkpɛ bɔ e vɛ jlɛ
e lɛ ɖo hɛnnumɔ gege ɖo finɛ
amɔ jehovah mawu nugbo ɔ wɛ sala nɔ sɛn
biblu ɖɔ lee e ɖo nuɖiɖi gbɔn e a
ðo tɔ tɔn sɛn vodun nu taan ɖe
ðebu wɛ e na bo nyi ɔ e da ablaxamu nya ɖe wɛ bo nyi mɛxo nu xwe wo
bibɛmɛ nya enɛ wa huzu tɔ nu mɛ e ɖi nu nu mawu lɛ e bi
hlɔmanu lɛ ye hɛn alɔwliwli yetɔn lido gbɔn sisi xoɖɔɖokpɔ ɖagbe kpo jlo sisɔ do ɖeɖɛ tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ ɖo kpɔ kpo gblamɛ
amɔ ɖo taji hu bi ɔ wanyiyi e ye ɖo nu mawu yetɔn e wɛ dɔn ye ɖo bu
amɔ zaan ɔ nuɖe jɛ akɔn ji nu ye
biblu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ sala ɔ wɛnsinɔ wɛ e ji vi ɖe a
bibɛmɛ ðo aca yetɔn mɛ hwe enɛ nu ɔ ninɔmɛ sala tɔn vɛwu tawun
amɔ e nɔ gbeji nu mawu tɔn kpo asu tɔn kpo
atavi ylɔ vi ablaxamu tɔn lɔti wa ci vi ɖɔhun nu ye
ye ɖo vivo mɛ ganji kaka jɛ hwenu e nu lɛ bi huzu e
ablaxamu wa sala gɔn kpo akpakpa sɔ mɛ ɖaxo kpo
e sixu ɖi nu e e se tlolo e a
mawu e ye nɔ sɛn e wɛ ɖɔ xo tlolo bo tlɛ lɛ tɔn do ji tɔn gbɔn wɛnsagun ɖe gblamɛ
do nukun mɛ bo kpɔn sala ɖo asu tɔn kpɔn wɛ kpo nukun tɔn ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ kpo bo ɖo gbigbɔ wɛ bo kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ etɛ e ka ɖɔ nu we
kɛnklɛn ɖɔ nu mi
bɔya ablaxamu na ko jinjɔn ayi hwɛ ba do mɔ eɖee mɛ enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ nu e jehovah ɖɔ e tɔn sin to towe mɛ tɔn sin hɛnnumɔ towe lɛ mɛ bo yi to e un na xlɛ we ɔ mɛ
mɛsɛdo ee akpakpa e ɖo ye sɔ wɛ e hwihwɛ gudo e ɔ ye lin tamɛ kpɔn do azɔ e zɔn ye wɛ jehovah ɖe gbɔn mɔ e ji
ye ɖo na jo gbɛ vivo tɔn e zan wɛ ye ɖe e do bo na jɛ gbejagbeja gbɔn ji
nɛ sala ka na wa nu gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ablaxamu kpɔn ɛ tlitli
e ka na nɔ gudo tɔn ɖo huzuhuzu ɖaxo enɛ e byɔ gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ e mɛ a
nu e kpannukɔn sala e sixu nyi nu yɔyɔ nu mi
mi sixu ɖɔ mawu zɔn nu mɔhun ɖe mi alo mɛ e un da e kpɔn a
e ɖo mɔ co ninɔmɛ mɔhun ɖe ka nɔ kpannukɔn mi mɛ bi a ce
gbɛ e mɛ mi ɖe e yi wan nu nu agbaza tɔn lɛ bo sixu byɔ mi ɖɔ vivomɛninɔ miɖesunɔ tɔn nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ alo nu e na zɔn bɔ ayi mitɔn na lɛ e ni mya nukun nu mi hu nu bi
amɔ nu vo wɛ biblu byɔ mi ɖɔ mi ni wa nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ni mya nukun nu mi jɛ nukɔn bonu xomɛ mawu tɔn hinhɛn hun ni mya nukun nu mi hu miɖesunɔ tɔn hinhɛn hun
hwenu e sala ɖo agban do wɛ e ɔ e nɔ kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ etɛ emi ka na sɔ etɛ emi ka na jo do a ji
e sixu hɛn agban e toci lɛ kpo lakunmi lɛ kpo ma sixu hɛn a e a mɔ jɛn e ma sixu hɛn nu ɖebu e ma na nyɔ zan nu ye hwenu e ye na ɖo yiyi wɛ e a e nɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ye ɖo na sa nuɖokan yetɔn lɛ gege alo na mɛ
yiyi ɔ na zɔn bɔ sala na lɛ ji nu ɖevo lɛ sin ya e wɛ nyi ɖɔ axi alo cɔfu ɖeɖee mɛ e nɔ yawu yi blewun bo nɔ xɔ jinukun lan atin sinsɛn avɔ kpo nu ɖevo lɛ kpo e bi na glo
nuɖiɖi sala tɔn sisɛ ɛ jo gbɛ fɛɛ mɛ ninɔ tɔn do
vlafo e na ko lɛ vɛwu nu sala bɔ e na jo xwe tɔn do
enyi e ci lee xwe e ɖo wuu lɛ e gege ɖe bɔ dobanunutɔ lɛ xlɛ e ɖɔhun hun nu gege wɛ sala jo do nɛ
ðe lɛ ɖo xwe enɛ lɛ mɛ bo nɔ ɖo xɔnɔnɔ mɔkpan gɔ nu sin e e dɔn gbɔn do glɔ lɛ e kpo pɔnpi lɛ kpo
e tlɛ nɔ gba xɔ kpaa lɛ syɛnsyɛn do lɛ nɔ syɛn ganji bɔ e sixu su hɔn lɛ kpo cavi kpo
goxɔ ɖe ka sixu cyɔn alɔ mɛ ji ɖo ajotɔ lɛ si mɔ a
alo bo sixu zɔn bɔ kinnikinni kpɔ lɔnmɔ kpo hla kpo e tiin tawun ɖo biblu sin taan mɛ hwenɛnu e na kpe mɛ wu a a
bɔ hɛnnumɔ sala tɔn e na jo do wɛ e ɖe lɛ e ka lo
gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn e ɖɔ tɔn sin to towe mɛ tɔn sin hɛnnumɔ towe lɛ mɛ e xwixwedo na ko vɛwu nu sala tawun
nyɔnu ɖe wɛ bo nyɔ xomɛ tawun e sixu ko ɖo nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo nɔvi tɔn lɛ sin vi lɛ nafi tɔn lɛ nagan tɔn lɛ atavi tɔn lɛ kpo atagan tɔn lɛ kpo lɔ sixu ko ɖo finɛ yi wan nu ye tawun bɔ vlafo e sɔ na mɔ ye gbeɖe a
e ɖo mɔ co ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ sala nɔ kpɔn nukɔn sɛdo kpo adɔgbigbo kpo bo ɖo nu sɔ wɛ ba yi
wuvɛ lɛ ɖo finɛ co sala bo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ bo na yi ɖo gbe ɔ gbe pɛpɛpɛ
tɛlaxi e nyi xwedo ɔ sin tɔgbo e sin xwe na ko yi afɔɖe mɔ co e ka xwedo ablaxamu kpo sala kpo
bibɛmɛ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ sala ɖo na wa nu gege ba do kpe nukun do mɛjitɔ tɔn mɛxomɔ enɛ wu
lɔti lɔ na xwedo ye hwenu e ye ɖo tonu se nu jehovah wɛ bo gosin kaludeenu lɛ tomɛ e mɛsɛdo
ye mlɛ eflati tɔ ɔ bo to yi jɛ agban ɖo halaani hwɛ e ɖo kilomɛtlu mɔ ɖo totaligbe gbadahweji
xwedo ɔ nɔ halaani nu taan ɖe
tɛlaxi na ko wli azɔn ɖo finɛ bo sɔ sixu yi nukɔn hu mɔ a
xwedo ɔ nɔ finɛ kaka jɛ hwenu e e ɖo xwe bo ku e
ðo hweɖenu cobɔ ye na lɛ ɖido ɔ jehovah lɛvɔ ɖɔ nu ablaxamu ɖɔ e ni gosin to enɛ mɛ bo yi to e emi na xlɛ ɛ e mɛ
ðo din tɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ mawu do akpakpa sɔ mɛ sin akpa elɔ gɔ na un na ze we do blo akɔta ɖaxo ɖokpo na
bibɛmɛ amɔ hwenu e ye gosin halaani e ɔ ablaxamu ko ɖo xwe bɔ sala ko ɖo xwe ye ka ɖo vi ɖe a
nɛ ablaxamu ka sixu do akɔta ɖe sin kun gbɔn
asi ɖevo wɛ e ka na da a
asi gege dida nyi aca ɖe bo gbakpe hwenɛnu enɛ wu ɔ sala sixu ko nɔ lin nu kpɔn do nu enɛ ji hwɛhwɛ
ðebu wɛ e na bo nyi gbɔn ɔ ye gosin halaani bo ɖido nukɔn
amɔ ɖo ayi mɛ e kpo ye kpo zɔn din lɛ e wu
tan ɔ ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ ablaxamu sin xwedo bɛ dɔkun yetɔn lɛ kpo mɛsɛntɔ e ye xɔ ɖo halaani lɛ e kpo bo yi
amɔ jwifu hwexonu tɔn ɖe lɛ tinmɛ ɖɔ mɛ e xo wemafɔ enɛ ɖɔ lɛ e sixu ko lɛ nyi kosi ɖeɖee wa gɔ nu ablaxamu kpo sala kpo ɖo jehovah sinsɛn mɛ lɛ e
enyi mɔ hun e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nuɖiɖi ɖaxo e sala ɖo e na ko mɛ ɖevo lɛ tawun hwenu e e ɖo xo ɖɔ nu ye do mawu tɔn kpo nukunɖiɖo tɔn kpo wu wɛ e
tamɛ linlin do nu enɛ ji na mi tawun ɖo taan e mɛ nuɖiɖi kpo nukunɖiɖo kpo han tawun e wɛ mi ɖe
enyi a kplɔn nu ɖagbe ɖe ɖo biblu mɛ ɔ a ka na sixu ma xa mɛ ɖevo a
ee ye eflati tɔ ɔ ɖo nisaan j h m mɔ gudo e ɔ ye tunta tofɔligbe fi e jehovah tɔn nu ye e
tintɔn do nukun mɛ bo kpɔn hwenu e sala nɔ kpɔn nu lɛlɛ do eɖee lobo nɔ kpɔn ɖɛkpɛ ayi ɔ ji tɔn lee e ɖo sinmɛ vovo gbɔn e kpo lee finɛ nyɔ nɔ sɔ e kpo sɛdo
jehovah lɛvɔ sɔ eɖee xlɛ ablaxamu ɖo malin malin do atin ɖaxo mɔlee tɔn ɖeɖee ɖo sikɛmu kpa lɛ e bo ɖɔ un na na to elɔ kunkan towe
xokwin kunkan ɔ na ko ɖo tinmɛ nu ablaxamu tawun
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e na ko flin jikpa edɛni tɔn sɛdo finɛ wɛ jehovah ko ɖe ɖɔ kunkan ɖe na su kun do nu sataan
jehovah ko ɖɔ nu ablaxamu ɖɔ akɔta e na gosin kun tɔn mɛ e na hun nyɔna lɛ sin ali nu gbɛtɔ lɛ bi ɖo ayikungban ji bibɛmɛ
e ɖo mɔ co xwedo ɔ gɔn wuvɛ gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ mɔ a
adɔ tɔn ɖo kanaa bɔ ablaxamu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn bo na kpla xwedo tɔn yi ejipu ɖo tofɔligbe
amɔ e mɔ awovinu e na jɛ ɖo xa enɛ mɛ e ɖe sɛdo
enyi ye ɖɔ mɔ hun kɛnklɛn ɖɔ nu ye ɖɔ nɔvi ce wɛ a nyi bonu ye na kpe nukun do wu ce ganji ɖo hwɛ wu enɛ ɔ e na sin hwɛ wu bɔ un na gan
bibɛmɛ etɛwu ablaxamu ka byɔ nu bunɔ mɔhun
ablaxamu nyi adingbannɔ alo xɛsinɔ lee akɔwe ɖe lɛ ɖɔ gbɔn e a
nugbo ɔ tɔvi tɔn wɛ sala nyi
nu e ablaxamu byɔ e sɔgbe tawun
ablaxamu kpo sala kpo tuun ɖɔ nuɖe kun sɔ ɖo taji hu linlin mawu tɔn e ɖɔ ɖɔ kunkan bunɔ ɖe kpo akɔta ɖe kpo na gbɔn ablaxamu ji e o enɛ wu ɔ ganjininɔ ablaxamu tɔn wa huzu nu taji hu nu bi nu ye
hu mɔ ɔ dobanunu dokunkun tɔn sin kunnuɖenu lɛ xlɛ ɖɔ mɛ e ɖo acɛ kpa wɛ ɖo ejipu lɛ e nɔ yawu yi sunnu ɖe sin asi bo nɔ hu asu tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ ablaxamu wa nu kpo nunywɛ kpo bɔ sala hwihwɛ eɖee bo ɖo gbe kpɔ xa ɛ
ye yi ɖo gbe nu falawɔɔn ɖegbe ɖɔ e ni kpla nyɔnu ɔ wa nu emi
e na vɛwu bɔ e na mɔ nu jɛ adohu adohu ablaxamu tɔn alo xɛsi e ɖo na ko ɖi sala e wu
amɔ e ci ɖɔ e kun wa nu xa ɛ kannumɔ ɖe ɖɔhun o loɔ e yi i jonɔ nukunɖeji ɖe ɖɔhun
boya falawɔɔn kan ayixa bo na do ɖɔ xo lobo na lɛ sɔ dɔkun tɔn lɛ do gba nukunmɛ bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e na ɖɔ kpo ablaxamu kpo na huzu asi tɔn bibɛmɛ
do nukun mɛ kpɔn ɖɔ sala ɖo hɔnmɛ ɔ sin flɛtɛli ɖe nu alo sin agba ɖe ji bo ɖo ejipu to ɔ sin tanu kpɔn sɛdo wɛ
din e e lɛvɔ wa ɖo xɔ e e gba kpodo bliki kpo e mɛ bɔ nuɖuɖu ɖagbe lɛ ɖo nukɔn tɔn e ɔ nɛ e ka ci
gbɛ fɛɛ mɛ ninɔ tɔn vlafo ee tlɛ nyɔ tawun hu wuu tɔn e e tuun e ka gba tamɛ wɛ a
enyi e ko ba na jo ablaxamu do bo huzu falawɔɔn enɛ sin asi wɛ ɔ kpɔn lee e na ko vivi nu sataan sɔ e
amɔ sala wa nu mɔhun ɖe a
e nɔ gbeji nu asu tɔn nu alɔwliwli tɔn bo lɛ nɔ nu mawu tɔn
enyi mɛ e wli alɔ ɖo gbɛ nublibliwiwa tɔn egbe tɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ ɖe gbejininɔ mɔhun xlɛ ɔ kpɔn lee e na nyɔ sɔ e
a ka sixu xwedo kpɔndewu gbejininɔ tɔn sala tɔn hwenu e a ɖo nu wa xa mɛ vivɛna towe lɛ kpo xɔntɔn towe lɛ kpo wɛ e a
jehovah byɔ xo ɔ mɛ bo sɛ azɔn baɖabaɖa ɖe lɛ do falawɔɔn kpo xwedo tɔn kpo do cyɔn alɔ nyɔnu vivɛna enɛ ji
hwenu e falawɔɔn se ɖɔ ablaxamu si wɛ nu sala e ɔ e lɛkɔ sɛdo asu tɔn gɔn bo ɖɔ nu xwedo ɔ bi ɖɔ ye ni gosin ejipu
bibɛmɛ hwenu e ablaxamu lɛvɔ mɔ asi vivɛna tɔn e ɔ kpɔn lee e na ko vivi sɔ e
flin ɖɔ e ko ɖɔ kpo wanyiyi kpo ɖɔ un tuun ɖɔ a nyɔ ɖɛkpɛ
amɔ ɖɛkpɛ sala tɔn alɔkpa ɖevo lɛ dɔn ɛ tawun ɖɛkpɛ ɖe wɛ bo hugan ee e nyɔ ɖo nukunta e
sala nyɔ ɖɛkpɛ xomɛ tɔn nugbo ɔ ɖɛkpɛ enɛ wɛ nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ
piyɛɛ ðɛkpɛ mɔhun wɛ mi bi sixu tɛnkpɔn bo nyɔ
enyi mi nɔ sɔ gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ bo nɔ tɛnkpɔn bo nɔ ma nu e mi tuun do mawu wu lɛ e xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ bo nɔ lɛ jɛhun do nugbododo mawu tɔn e kunkpla walɔ ɖagbe lɛ e ji ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ nukɔn kpo gbejininɔ kpo ɔ mi na ɖi nu sala ɖɔhun
tɛlaxi wɛ ji ye mɛ we lɛ bi ɖo nɔ vovo xomɛ
bibɛmɛ alɔwliwli mɔhun sɔgbe ɖo egbe a amɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi ni hɛn mɛ ɖɔ nu lɛ gbɔn vo tawun hwenɛnu
adamu kpo ɛvu kpo hɛn mɛ maɖoblɔ e ye nyi e bu e ɔ e ko lin din hwenɛnu a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɖo hwɛhuhu ko hɛn nu gble do mɛ enɛ lɛ wu din a wutu ɔ alɔwliwli ɖo hɛnnumɔ lɛ tɛntin nɔ dɔn azɔn baɖabaɖa lɛ wa kunkan lɛ mɛ a
amɔ ɖo xwe mɔ gudo ɔ hwɛhuhu ko do gbɛtɔ lɛ ji bi nɛ
hwe enɛ nu ɔ mɔyizi sɛn ɔ gbɛ ɖɔ hɛnnumɔ ɖe ɔ ni ma ɖoxo xa ɖe ɔ o levii vi lɛ
etɛ ka nyi xosin towe
nu e biblu ɖɔ e
un tuun ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ nɔ gbo hwɛ nu lelenɔ e nɔ jɛhun do wamamɔnɔ ji
ðɛhan axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn na dɔn nujlɔjlɔwiwa wa ayikungban ɔ ji
nu ɖevo tɛ biblu ka sixu kplɔn mi
mawu nɔ mɔ nuagɔwiwa e gɔ gbɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ e bo na jla ye ɖo nunywɛtɔxo
nujlɔjlɔwiwa e gosin mawu gɔn e na dɔn fifa kpo ayijayi kpo wa ayikungban ɔ ji ezayii
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ lin ɖɔ mawu kɔn nyɔna do gbɛtɔ gbɛnu taji ɖe lɛ ji lobo donu ɖevo lɛ bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ka nɔ lin ɖɔ mawu nɔ wa nu xa mɛ bi ɖo ali ɖokpo ɔ nu
etɛ a ka lin
nu e biblu ɖɔ e
mawu nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛɖe mɛ a loɔ ɖo akɔta ɖebu mɛ ɔ mɛ e nɔ ɖo sisi bo nɔ xwedo hwɛjijɔ ɔ mɛ enɛ sin nu nɔ nyɔ nukun tɔn mɛ
mɛsɛdo ðo mawu nukunmɛ ɔ gbɛtɔ lɛ bi wɛ ɖo zɛnzɛn
nu ɖevo tɛ biblu ka sixu kplɔn mi
biblu ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɖe nu to bi akɔta bi gbe bi kpodo togun bi kpo nuɖexlɛmɛ
nu a jlo na tuun nu ɖevo lɛ do hwenu e nujlɔjlɔwiwa na gɔ ayikungban ɔ ji e wu hun kpɔn wemata wema elɔ tɔn etɛ biblu ka kplɔn mɛ tawun kunnuɖetɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ ɖetɔn
e lɛvɔ ɖo www jw org ji
le livre de la revelation quelle est sa signification
kpɔn la bible et vous questions biblique glɔ
watch tower bible and tract society of pennsylvania
e nɔ sa wema elɔ a
e blo nu azɔ biblu kpinkplɔnmɛ tɔn e e nɔ wa gbɔn gbɛ ɔ bi mɛ kpo alɔdo jlo ɖagbenɔ lɛ tɔn kpo e
nu a jlo na na nunina ɖe hun kɛnklɛn yi www jw org ji
nu e ma ɖexlɛ ɖo alɔkpa ɖevo mɛ a ɔ wemafɔ e e ɖe do wema elɔ mɛ lɛ e gosin biblu fɔngbe tɔn mawuxowema mɛ bɔ mi wlan ɖo alɔkpa e mɛ e nɔ wlan nu gbɔn ɖo egbe e
nuwlanwlan ɖeɖee nya lɛ e ɔ miɖesu wɛ sɔ ye ɖo mɔ
xojlawema elɔ e nyi atɔxwɛ e nɔ kpa susu nu jehovah mawu axɔsu wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn
e nɔ do gbɔ nu gbɛtɔ lɛ gbɔn wɛnɖagbe elɔ gblamɛ zaanɖe din ɔ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn na ɖo jixwe bo na ɖe nunyanyawiwa lɛ bi siin bo na blo bɔ ayikungban ɔ na huzu palaɖisi ɖe
e nɔ lɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖɔ e ni ɖi nu nu jezu klisu e ku do ta mitɔn mɛ bonu mi na do sixu mɔ gbɛ mavɔmavɔ e eyɛ wɛ nyi axɔsu nu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn bo ɖo acɛ kpa wɛ din
sin wɛ e ko ɖo xojlawema elɔ ɖetɔn wɛ
e nɔ ɖo nu ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ mɛ a bo jinjɔn biblu kɛɖɛ ji
nukanbyɔ gɛdɛ gɛdɛ ðe
nu e biblu ðɔ do gbɛ kpo ku kpo wu e
hwenu e mɛvivɛ ðe ðo kuzɔn jɛ wɛ e
elias hutter kpo biblu tɔn ebleegbe tɔn nukunðeji lɛ kpo
wekwin ebleegbe tɔn kpɛvi bi ɔ na ganjɛwu ðaxo ðe mɛ
palaðisi ðo ayikungban ji dlɔ alo nujɔnu
etɛ biblu ka ðɔ
mawu ka jlo ɖɔ mi ni ku wɛ a
biblu ɖɔ mawu na sunsun ɖasin bi sin nukun yetɔn mɛ ku sɔ na tiin a nuɖexlɛmɛ
atɔxwɛ elɔ ɖɔ xo do nu e biblu ɖɔ do gbɛ kpo ku kpo wu e ji
ðibla yi sinsɛn ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ bi sin sinsɛnvi lɛ wɛ ɖi nu ɖɔ lindɔn gbɛtɔ tɔn kun nɔ ku o
xota e ðo akpa ɔ ji e etɛ biblu ka ðɔ do gbɛ kpo ku kpo wu
nu vovo wɛ mɛ lɛ nɔ lin do gbɛ kpo ku kpo wu
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ lin ɖɔ ɖo ku yetɔn gudo ɔ ye na kpo ɖo gbɛ bɔya ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖevo mɛ alo ɖo fi ɖevo
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ lin ɖɔ emi na vɔ jɔ bo lɛ wa nɔ gbɛmɛ fi
a sixu ɖo linlin hwiɖesunɔ tɔn do xo ɔ wu bɔ linlin enɛ sin kplɔn e a yi e alo aca fi e a jɔ ɖe e tɔn wu
ðo linlin e mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo do nu e nɔ jɛ ɖo ku gudo e wu e gbɔn vo tawun wutu ɔ mi ka sixu mɔ xosin e sɔgbe lɛ e nu nukanbyɔ gɛdɛ gɛdɛ enɛ ɖo mɛɖe gɔn alo ɖo fi ɖe a
nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɔ sinsɛngan lɛ ko kplɔn sinsɛn nukplɔnmɛ lindɔn jɔmaku tɔn ɔ mɛ
sinsɛn ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ ɖi sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn lɛ hindou tɔn lɛ jwifu lɛ tɔn lɛ malɛnu lɛ tɔn lɛ kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo sin sinsɛnvi lɛ bi wɛ ɖibla ɖi nu ɖɔ lindɔn kun nɔ ku o le e nɔ kpo ɖo gbɛ hwenu e agbaza ɔ ku e bo nɔ ɖo yɛswimɛ
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ bouddhiste lɛ nɔ lin ɖɔ enyi e vɔ jɔ azɔn nabi ɖe gudo ɔ nuwukpikpe taglomɛ tɔn e e ɖo e nɔ sɔ mɛ yi ninɔmɛ ɖagbeɖagbe e e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ nirvana e mɛ
nukplɔnmɛ mɔhun lɛ zɔn bɔ mɛ gege ɖo gbɛ ɔ mɛ wa ɖi nu ɖɔ ku nɔ hun gbɛ sin hɔn nu mɛ ɖo fi ɖevo
nu mɛ gege ɔ gbɛ sin akpaxwe taji ɖe wɛ ku nyi bɔ jlo mawu tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ gbɛtɔ ni ku
amɔ etɛ biblu ka ɖɔ do xo ɔ wu
kɛnklɛn xa xota e bɔ e
xosin ɔ sixu kpaca we
xota e ðo akpa ɔ ji e etɛ biblu ka ðɔ do gbɛ kpo ku kpo wu
ee mi xa nuɖiɖo lɛ sin tan ɖo wema biblu tɔn e nyi bibɛmɛ e mɛ e ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ mawu ɖɔ nu sunnu nukɔntɔn adamu ɖɔ a sixu ɖu atin e ɖo jikpa ɔ mɛ ɔ bi sin sinsɛn
amɔ atin e sin sinsɛn e nɔ ɖu bo nɔ tuun nu ɖagbe kpodo nu nyanya kpo ɔ kɛɖɛ jɛn a ma na ɖu a ɖo gbe e gbe a na ɖu ɔ a na ku
bibɛmɛ xo enɛ e zawe bo ma gɛdɛ a e xlɛ ɖɔ nu adamu setonu nu gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn wɛ ɔ e na ku a loɔ e na ɖo gbɛ tɛgbɛ ɖo jikpa edɛni tɔn mɛ
e blawu ɖɔ adamu kun setonu ba nɔ gbɛ kaka sɔyi o e nyɔ wa ɔ e sɔ jlo do xo gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn nyi kɛn bo ɖu atin sinsɛn e sin sɛn e do e hwenu e asi tɔn ɛvu na ɛ e
bibɛmɛ nu e mɛ to tlitli enɛ tɔn kɔ do e kpo ɖo nu wa do mi wu wɛ kaka jɛ egbe
mɛsɛdo pɔlu tinmɛ xo ɔ gbɔn le hwɛhuhu ɔ gbɛtɔ ɖokpo gee ji wɛ e gbɔn bo wa gbɛ ɔ mɛ mɛ enɛ wɛ nyi adamu hwɛhuhu ɔ ka dɔn ku wa
enɛ ɔ gbɛtɔ lɛ bi nɔ ku ɖo mɛ bi wɛ hu hwɛ
hlɔmanu lɛ amɔ etɛ ka nyi hwɛhuhu ɔ etɛwu e ka dɔn ku wa
nu e adamu wa bo sɔ jlo do tlito alo gba sɛn mawu tɔn e wɛ nyi hwɛhuhu
jaan nu e mɛ hwɛhuhu ɔ tɔn kɔ do e wɛ nyi ku lee mawu ko ɖɔ gbɔn nu adamu e
nu adamu kpo kunkan tɔn e na wa jɔ lɛ e kpo kpo ɖo tonu se nu gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn wɛ ɔ ye na ɖo hwɛ ɖe kɔ a ye ka na ku gbeɖe a
mawu blo gbɛtɔ nu e na ku a loɔ e na nɔ gbɛ wu wɛ bo tlɛ na nɔ kaka sɔyi
amɔ nuɖe ɖo gbɛtɔ mɛ bo nɔ kpo ɖo gbɛ ɖo ku gudo wɛ a
mɛ gege na ɖɔ ɛɛn ɖɔ nuɖe ɖo gbɛtɔ mɛ bo nɔ nyi lindɔn bo kun nɔ ku o
enyi mɔ hun adingban wɛ mawu ɖo nu adamu nɛ
gbɔn nɛ e
ðo enyi nuɖe nɔ tɔn sin gbɛtɔ mɛ bo nɔ yi nɔ gbɛ ɖo fi ɖevo ɖo ku gudo hun ku sɔ nyi ba e hwɛhuhu dɔn wa lee mawu ko ɖɔ gbɔn e a nɛ
biblu ɖɔ mawu sixu ɖo adingban a
eblee lɛ e na ɖɔ xo nugbo ɔ sataan wɛ hwenu e e ɖɔ xo elɔ nu ɛvu e mi na ku ɖe a bibɛmɛ
enɛ wɛ dɔn nukanbyɔ elɔ wa enyi adingban ji wɛ nukplɔnmɛ lindɔn jɔmaku tɔn ɔ jinjɔn ɔ etɛ ka nɔ jɛ ɖo ku gudo tawun
nuɖiɖo lɛ sin tan e ɖo bibɛmɛ mɛ e ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ kan kɔ do mɛ gbɛtɔ bo fun funfun e nɔ na gbɛ mɛ ɔ do awɔntin tɔn mɛ bɔ gbɛtɔ ɔ huzu mɛ gbɛɖe
xokwin ebleegbe tɔn wɛ e lilɛ do mɛ gbɛɖe bibɛmɛ
enɛ wu ɔ biblu xlɛ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ e kun da gbɛtɔ bɔ e ɖo lindɔn jɔmaku ɖe o
e nyɔ wa ɔ gbɛtɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo wɛ nyi mɛ gbɛɖe
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ gbɛtɔ lɛ ɖo nu e mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ lindɔn jɔmaku e a co etɛwu sinsɛn gege ka nɔ kplɔn enɛ mɛ
xosin ɔ kpla mi yi ejipu hwexonu tɔn mɛ
herodote e nyi hwenuxo wlantɔ grece tɔn ɖe ɖo xwe kanweko atɔɔngɔ j h m e ɖɔ ɖɔ ejipunu lɛ wɛ nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn ɖeɖee jɛhun do lindɔn jɔmaku xo ɔ ji e
e mɔ linlin lindɔn jɔmaku tɔn ɔ ɖo aca babilɔnunu hwexonu tɔn lɛ tɔn lɔmɔ mɛ
taan e mɛ alexandre ðaxo ɔ ɖu ɖo gbadahweji azii tɔn ji ɖo j h m e ɔ tamɛnukplɔnmɛtɔ grece tɔn lɛ funfun nukplɔnmɛ ɔ bɔ tlolo jɛn e gbakpe axɔsuɖuto grece tɔn ɔ bi mɛ
a na mɔ xogbe lindɔn jɔmaku ɔ ɖo wemafɔ biblu tɔn ɖebu mɛ a
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn h m tɔn ɔ sinsɛngbɛta jwifu lɛ tɔn nukunɖeji we essenien lɛ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo kplɔn mɛ ɖɔ lindɔn nɔ kpo ɖo gbɛ hwenu e agbaza ko ku e
jewish encyclopedia ɖɔ nukplɔnmɛ lindɔn jɔmaku tɔn ɔ nukplɔnmɛ grece nu lɛ tɔn mɛ wɛ jwifu lɛ sɔ sin ɖo taji ɔ gbɔn tamɛnukplɔnmɛ platon tɔn lɛ gblamɛ
mɔ ɖokpo ɔ hwenuxo wlantɔ jwifu josephe e nɔ gbɛ ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nukplɔnmɛ ɔ kun gosin mawuxowema ɔ mɛ o loɔ grece nu lɛ wɛ ɖi nu na e mɔ ɖɔ xɛxo e xɛxoɖɔtɔ yetɔn lɛ xokple lɛ e mɛ wɛ e ɖe
ee aca grece tɔn ɖo gbigbakpe wɛ e ɔ klisanwun nyijɛtɔ lɛ lɔ wa sɔ nukplɔnmɛ pagawun lɛ tɔn enɛ
sɔgbe kpo xo e hwenuxo wlantɔ jona lendering ɖɔ e kpo ɔ nukplɔnmɛ platon tɔn e ɖɔ ɖɔ lindɔn mitɔn ko nɔ fi ɖagbe ɖe cobo wa ɖo gbɛ gblegble ɖe mɛ din e zɔn bɔ tamɛnukplɔnmɛ platon tɔn yawu byɔ sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn lɛ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ sinsɛn nukplɔnmɛ pagawun tɔn e ɖɔ ɖɔ lindɔn kun nɔ ku o e byɔ sinsɛn klisanwun nyijɛtɔ lɛ tɔn mɛ bo wa huzu ɖokpo ɖo nu taji e ye ɖi nu na lɛ e mɛ
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ mɛsɛdo pɔlu elɔ nu mɛ gbigbɔ ɔ ɖesu ko ɖɔ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ mɛɖe lɛ na jo nuɖiɖi do bo na ɖoto gbigbɔ e nɔ flu mɛ lɛ kpodo yɛ nyanya lɛ sin nukplɔnmɛ kpo
timɔtee kpɔn lee xo enɛ lɛ nyi nugbo sɔ e
kpɔndewu yɛ nyanya lɛ sin nukplɔnmɛ tɔn ɖe wɛ lindɔn jɔmaku xo ɔ nyi
biblu yi gbe na a bɔ azinkan tɔn gosin sinsɛn pagawun hwexonu tɔn lɛ kpo tamɛnukplɔnmɛ lɛ kpo mɛ
e vivi nu mi bɔ jezu ɖɔ mi na tuun nugbo ɔ bɔ nugbo ɔ na ɖe mi sin kannumɔgbenu
jaan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ e sɔgbe e ɖiɖo do nugbo biblu tɔn wu nɔ ɖe mi sin kannumɔgbenu nukplɔnmɛ kpo nuwalɔ ɖeɖee ma wli yɛyi nu mawu a bɔ sinsɛn gege nɔ kplɔn mɛ ɖo gbɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo tɔn
gbɛɖotɔ mitɔn do gbɛtɔ lɛ ji bonu ye na nɔ gbɛ nu xwe alo kpowun ɖo ayikungban ji lobo wa yi nɔ fi ɖevo kaka sɔyi a
linlin e e ɖo nu gbɛtɔ lɛ ɖo bibɛmɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ye na nɔ gbɛ ɖo ayikungban ji fi kaka sɔyi bo na nyi vi tɔn tonusetɔ lɛ
wanyiyi e mawu ɖo nu gbɛtɔ lɛ e sin xlɛ ɖokpo wɛ linlin ɖaxo enɛ nyi bɔ nu ɖe ka sixu mɛ a
malacii mawu sɔ mɛ nu ðɛhan wlantɔ ɔ na jiɖe mi ɖɔ ayikungban ɔ na nyi hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ tɔn bɔ ye na nɔ ji kaka sɔyi ðɛhan
nu a na mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu e biblu ɖɔ do gbɛ kpo ku kpo wu e mɛ hun kpɔn wemata wema etɛ biblu ka kplɔn mɛ tawun
tɔn kunnuɖetɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ ɖetɔn
e lɛvɔ ɖo www jw org ji
posidonia oceanica wɛ e nɔ ylɔ ye ɖɔ gbehan xu mɛ tɔn alɔkpa ɖe wɛ bo cyɔn mɛditɛlanɛɛ xu ɔ sin azan ji bi ɖo espagne kpo chypre kpo tɛntin
enyi gbehan lɛ sixu dɔji sɔmɔ ɔ gbɛtɔ lɛ ka lo
dobanunutɔ ɖeɖee nɔ ba do nu nu e nɔ zɔn bɔ e nɔ kpo lɛ e ɖe lɛ ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ ɖɔ gbɛtɔ sixu dɔji hu lee e nɔ dɔ gbɔn din e
ði kpɔndewu ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ wema e ɖɔ xo do nu enɛ wu e ɖe gbeje nu taji tobutobu e nunywɛ xwitixwiti ba do na ɖo ali enɛ nu lɛ e bi kpɔn
nukɔnyiyi e tiin ɖo nunywɛ xwitixwiti linu e to na zɔn bonu jidɔ gbɛtɔ tɔn na jɛji alo gbɔ ɔ ayi jɛn mi na ɖe bo na wa kpɔn
amɔ nukunɖiɖo gbɛ ninɔ kaka sɔyi tɔn nugbo ɔ na sin nunywɛ xwitixwiti egbe tɔn wu a
biblu do gesi gbɛɖotɔ mitɔn jehovah mawu bo ɖɔ hwi gɔn wɛ gbɛ ɔ jɔ sin
ðɛhan jezu klisu xoɖɛ sɛdo e bo ɖɔ gbɛ mavɔmavɔ ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ ye ni tuun we bo tuun ɖɔ hwi wɛ nyi mawu nugbo ɖokpo e tiin e bo lɛ tuun jezu klisu e a sɛdo gbɛ ɔ mɛ e
jaan nugbo ɔ gan ɖeɖee mi do bo na tuun jehovah mawu kpo vi tɔn jezu klisu kpo lobo na lɛ hɛn xomɛ yetɔn hun lɛ e ɔ e na sɔ nyɔna mavɔmavɔ lɛ do tɔn mi
dobanunutɔ lɛ lin ɖɔ gbehan xu mɛ tɔn alɔkpa elɔ ɖe lɛ dɔji nu xwe afatɔn mɔkpan
ðo klewun mɛ ɔ biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛkuku lɛ ɖo yɔdo mɛ bo ɖo te kpɔn finfɔn sin ku
jaan ye ɖo ya ji wɛ alo ɖo wuvɛ ɖebu mɛ a ɖo mɛ e ko ku lɛ sɔ tuun nuɖe a
nunywɛtɔxo ðo nukplɔnmɛ jezu tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ e sɔ ku jlɛ do amlɔ wu
jaan enɛ wu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ mi ni ɖi xɛsi nu mɛ ɖeɖee ku lɛ e alo fa xomɛ nu ye gbɔn vɔsisa nu ye gblamɛ a
ye sixu mi alo hɛn nu gble do mi wu a ɖo tamɛ linlin nutuuntuun kpo nunywɛ kpo ɖe ɖo yɔdo mɛ a
nunywɛtɔxo amɔ gbɔn finfɔn sin ku gblamɛ ɔ mawu na su kun do nu ku kaka sɔyi kɔlɛntinu lɛ nuɖexlɛmɛ
mi sixu ɖeji mlɛmlɛ ɖɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ mi ni ganjɛ nu e biblu ɖɔ e wu
etɛwu
dowatɔ ðokpo gee wema wɛ ɖo biblu ɔ mɛ bɔ mɛ mɔ wlan ɖo xwe kanweko donu jɛji vlamɛ sin j h m wa h m mɔ
e ɖe xo lɛ xlɛ mɛ ɖeɖee wlan lɛ e
gbesisɔ ðo hwenuxo linu nu ɖeɖee e wlan do biblu mɛ lɛ e sɔgbe bi mlɛmlɛ xa kunnuɖenu nu e jɛ ɖo hwenuxo mɛ lɛ e tɔn
wema ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ hwenu e tan lɛ xɛxo lɛ kpo kunnuɖiɖe agɔ sin wema lɛ kpo nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu lɛ jɛ ɖo fi linlin ɖe alo ɖo hwenu linlin ɖe ɖie e ɔ tan biblu tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖɔ fi e nu lɛ jɛ ɖe e kpo azan e gbe ye jɛ e kpo pɛpɛpɛ
ði kpɔndewu ɔ ɖo wema levii vi lɛ tɔn sin wemata kpo kpo mɛ ɔ e na sɛn izlayɛli vi lɛ do wufifɛ kpo jɛmɛji kpo wu ko lin tawun cobɔ e wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ azɔnkwin lɛ kpo lee ye nɔ mɛ gbɔn e kpo wu
biblu lɛvɔ ɖɔ xo do lee ayikungban ɔ ɖo toboo gbɔn e kpo lee e ɖo gblolo mɛ gbɔn e kpo wu xwe kanweko mɔkpan gudo wɛ nunywɛ xwitixwiti wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu enɛ lɛ wu ganji jɔbu ezayii
xoɖɔɖokpɔ do nujɔnu mɛ do mɛhwenu ɖo taji tawun
hwenu e e mɔ nutitɛ taglomɛ tɔn syɛnsyɛn ɖe nu doreen sin asu wesley ee ɖo xwe kpowun e ɔ doreen flu bi
dotoo lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ sun yɔywɛ ɖe jɛn kpo bɔ e na nɔ gbɛ na
un sixu ɖi nu e un se e a wɛ e flin
nu aklunɔzan gbla mɔkpan ɔ un flu bi
e ci nu mi ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo wu wɛ nu enɛ ɖo jijɛ do wɛ ɖɔhun bo kun nyi midɛɛ lɛ wu o
un sɔnu tɔn ɖebu a
kuzɔn ɖe sixu do mɛɖebu lele mɛ ɖo hweɖebunu
e jɛ acɔ tawun ɖɔ mɛ gege nɔ sɔ jlo do kpe nukun do mɛvivɛ yetɔn e e mɔ kuzɔn ɖe na e wu
amɔ nukunkpikpe do azinzɔnnɔ wu vɛwu tawun
etɛ hagbɛ xwedo ɖe tɔn lɛ ka sixu wa do do gbɔ nu mɛvivɛ yetɔn e ɖo kuzɔn ɖe jɛ wɛ e bo lɛ kpe nukun wu tɔn
nɛ nukunkpemɛwutɔ lɛ ka sixu ɖi xwi xa wuvɛ tobutobu e ye sixu mɔ ɖo azɔn ɔ hwenu lɛ e gbɔn
ee ku mɛ ɔ tɔn ɖo sisɛkpɔ wɛ e ɔ etɛ e ka sixu ɖo nukun
jɛ nukɔn hwɛ ɔ mi nu mi ni kpɔn nu e wu nukunkpikpe do mɛ e ɖo kuzɔn ɖe jɛ wɛ e wu e nyi wuvɛ taji ɖe ɖo egbe e
xwe kanweko mɔ ɖie ɔ nu e ma xwe nabi e mɛ lɛ nɔ dɔji na e ɖo zɛnzɛn ɔ e hwe tawun hu egbe tɔn bo tlɛ nyi mɔ ɖo to hun nukun lɛ mɛ
jɛmɛji lɛ kpo alitawovi lɛ kpo nɔ yawu hu mɛ lɛ
dotooxwe lɛ tiin mɔ a bɔ hagbɛ xwedo tɔn lɛ wɛ nɔ kpe nukun do mɛ gege wu bɔ ye nɔ ku jɛ xwegbe
egbe ɔ nukɔnyiyi nunywɛ xwitixwiti tɔn ɖo lanmɛ na nɔ ganji linu zɔn bɔ dotoo lɛ kpewu bo nɔ liza xa azɔn syɛnsyɛn lɛ bɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ dɔji kpɛɖe
mɛɖe sixu ɖo azɔn e nɔ yawu hu mɛ e jɛ wɛ bɔ din ɔ e ka sixu nɔ gbɛ nu xwe gege gɔ na
amɔ jidɔ enɛ sixu nɔ ma zɔn bɔ azɔn ɔ gbɔ
hwɛhwɛ ɔ azinzɔnnɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo blɔ tawun nɔ zɔn bɔ ye sɔ nɔ sixu kpe nukun do yeɖee wu a
nukunkpikpe do mɛ mɔhun lɛ wu nɔ wa vɛwu tawun bo nɔ lɛ byɔ gandido
mɔ mɛ ɔ dotooxwe wɛ mɛ lɛ nɔ ku ɖe hwɛhwɛ e sɔ nyi xwegbe a
egbe ɔ mɛ gege tuun lee nu nɔ nyi gbɔn kaka bɔ gbɔjɛ mɛɖe tɔn nɔ xwɛ e a bɔ mɛ kpɛɖe jɛn mɔ bɔ mɛɖe ɖo kuku wɛ kpɔn
enɛ wu ɔ xɛsi e nɔ ɖi mɛ do nu e ja jijɛ gbe e wu e sixu vɔda nu gan ɖeɖee mɛɖe na do ba kpe nukun do xwedo tɔn sin hagbɛ e ɖo azɔn jɛ wɛ e wu e bo tlɛ sixu gbɔjɔ kan mɛ
etɛ ka sixu mɛ
lee ninɔmɛ doreen tɔn xlɛ gbɔn e ɔ mɛ gege nɔ flu bi hwenu e e mɔ kuzɔn ɖe nu mɛvivɛ yetɔn ɖe e
hwenu e adohu adohu ɖaxo xɛsi kpo aluwɛ kpo ɖo mɛɖe ji e ɔ etɛ ka sixu ɛ na sɔnu nu nu e ja jijɛ gbe e
mɛsɛntɔ mawu tɔn gbejinɔtɔ ɖe xoɖɛ bo ɖɔ kplɔn mi lee mi sixu xa azan mitɔn lɛ gbɔn e bonu mi na do sixu ɖo ayi nunywɛ tɔn
ðɛhan nwt xoɖɛ vivɛ sɛdo jehovah mawu bo byɔ ɖɔ e ni xlɛ lee emi na xa azan emitɔn lɛ kpo nunywɛ kpo gbɔn e emi enɛ ɔ a na sixu zan azan e kpo bɔ mɛvivɛ towe na nɔ gbɛ na e xa ɛ ɖo ali e nyɔ hugan e nu
enɛ byɔ ɖɔ e ni sɔnu ganji
enyi mɛvivɛ towe kpo ɖo nu kɛ wɛ bo ɖo jlo ba ɖɔ xo do xo ɔ wu ɔ e sixu nyi nunywɛnu ɖɔ a ni kan mɛ e ɖo na wa gbeta lɛ kɔn ɖo tɛn tɔn mɛ hwenu e mɔ wiwa na wa glo e e byɔ ɛ
mi ɖɔ xo ɖo kpɔ do nujɔnu mɛ do nu elɔ lɛ wu e na glɔn ɛ ɖo dotooxwe alo e yi gbe nu nukunkpikpe do mɛ wu bunɔ ɖe lɛ ɖi reanimation
mɔ biblo sixu ɖe gbemanɔkpɔ lɛ kpo hwɛ e hagbɛ xwedo ɔ tɔn ɖeɖee na wa gbeta lɛ kɔn ɖo tɛn tɔn mɛ lɛ e na do yeɖee e kpo kpo
xoɖɔɖokpɔ do nujɔnu mɛ do mɛhwenu na zɔn bɔ xwedo ɔ na sɔ ayi ɖo lee ye na kpe nukun do wu tɔn ɖo azɔn ɔ hwenu gbɔn e ji
e lɛn nuɖe na wa bo ma ɖo te nu mɛɖe a ɔ e nɔ yi ta a wɛ biblu ɖɔ nunywɛxo
hwɛhwɛ ɔ azɔ nukɔntɔn e nukunkpemɛwutɔ ɖe ɖo na wa e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e na do gbɔ nu mɛ
e ɖo na na ganjɛwu mɛ e ɖo kudonu e ɖɔ e yi wan bɔ e kun ɖo eɖokponɔ o
nɛ e ka sixu wa enɛ gbɔn
xa nu nu azinzɔnnɔ ɔ alo jihan cyan wema kpo han ɖeɖee na do wusyɛn lanmɛ bo na ɛ awajijɛ lɛ e kpo
mɛ gege tiin bɔ hwenu e xwedo yetɔn sin hagbɛ ɖe hɛn alɔ yetɔn bo ɖɔ xo nu ye kpo xomɛnyinyɔ kpo e ɔ e do gbɔ nu ye
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nu azinzɔnnɔ ɔ nɔ tuun mɛ e wa kpɔn ɛ lɛ e bi ɔ e nɔ
gbeɖiɖo ɖe ɖɔ ðo nuwukpikpe taji atɔɔn e wujɔnu gbɛtɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo e mɛ ɔ les cinq sens to tɔn wɛ nyi ee nɔ nɔte gbɔn gudo hwenu e mɛɖe ɖo kuku wɛ e
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖe mɛ ɔ e doya nu mɛsɛdo pɔlu kpo hagbɛ tɔn lɛ kpo syɛnsyɛn bɔ ye tlɛ sɔ tuun ɖɔ emi na gan lɔ a
alɔdo tɛ ye ka ba
pɔlu savo nu xɔntɔn tɔn lɛ bo ɖɔ miɖesunɔ ɔ mi na do alɔ mi ɖo ɖɛ e mi nɔ xo nu mi lɛ gblamɛ
kɔlɛntinu lɛ ðɛ vivɛ xixo ɖo linkpɔn ɖaxo kpo azɔn syɛnsyɛn kpo hwenu xɔ akwɛ tawun
hwɛhwɛ ɔ tuuntuun ɖɔ mɛvivɛ mɛtɔn ɖe ɖo kudonu nɔ zɔn bɔ e nɔ flu tawun
e kpaca mɛ a ɖo ku ɔ nyi nuɖe bo sɔgbe a
e da mi bonu mi na yi gbe ɖɔ ku nyi akpaxwe ɖe ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ a
hlɔmanu lɛ enɛ wu wɛ xo mawu tɔn ylɔ ku ɖɔ kɛntɔ
kɔlɛntinu lɛ enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo gaan ɖɔ mi kun nɔ ba na lin tamɛ ɖɔ mɛvivɛ mitɔn ɖe ɖo kudonu o ka sɔgbe lɔ
e ɖo mɔ co tamɛ linlin do nu e sixu wa jɛ e ji sixu hagbɛ xwedo ɔ tɔn lɛ bɔ xɛsi yetɔn na ɖekpo lobɔ ye na sɔ ayi ɖo nu ɖeɖee ye na wa do do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo ali e nyɔ hugan e nu e ji
e slɛ nu ɖeɖee sixu jɛ lɛ e ɖe lɛ do gbavi aklunɔzan gbla gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ kun nɔ nyi mɔ nu azinzɔnnɔ lɛ bi o mɔ jɛn ye ma nɔ wa ɖo alɔkpa ɖokpo ɔ mɛ a e nɛ
amɔ e hwe byɔ huzuhuzu enɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ nɔ tiin ɖo ninɔmɛ azinzɔnnɔ gege tɔn mɛ
ðo ku mɛvivɛ ɖe tɔn gudo ɔ e sixu nyi nunywɛnu ɖɔ e ni ylɔ xɔntɔn vivɛ mɛtɔn e ko yi gbe ba mɛ e ɖe
e sixu byɔ ɖɔ e ni na ganjɛwu nukunkpemɛwutɔ lɛ kpo xwedo ɔ kpo ɖɔ nu e gbo mɛvivɛ yetɔn e ko vɔ bɔ e kun sɔ ɖo wuvɛ ɖe mɔ wɛ o
gbɛɖotɔ mitɔn na jiɖe mi kpo xomɛnyinyɔ kpo ɖɔ mɛ e ko ku lɛ sɔ tuun nuɖe a nunywɛtɔxo
mi sixu kplɔn bo na dovɛ nu alɔdo mɛɖebu tɔn a
e ɖo taji ɖɔ e ni ganjɛ mawu wu e nyi hwenu e hagbɛ xwedo tɔn ɖe ɖo kuzɔn jɛ wɛ e kɛɖɛ wɛ e na wa mɔ a loɔ e ɖo na lɛ wa mɔ hwenu e wuvɛ e nɔ jɛ ku tɔn gudo lɛ e nɔ wa e
e sixu nɔ gudo nu we gbɔn xo kpo nuwiwa mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn e na we lɛ e kpo gblamɛ
un kplɔn bo nɔ dovɛ nu alɔdo mɛɖebu tɔn a wɛ doreen ɖɔ
nugbo ɔ alɔ e mɛ lɛ do mi lɛ e tunfla
nyɛ kpo asu ce kpo mɔ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ jehovah ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ un ɖo kpɔ xa mi bo na mi ɖo ninɔmɛ elɔ mɛ
un na wɔn gbeɖe a
ðo e wɛ da mi wutu ɔ e tuun wuvɛ mitɔn lɛ kpo aluwɛ mitɔn lɛ kpo
e kpewu bo na mi lobo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi bɔ mi na sixu dɛ bɔ akpakpa nɔ sɔ ɛ
hu mɔ ɔ e ɖɔ zaanɖe din ɔ emi na ɖe ku siin bi mlɛmlɛ bo na wa fɔn gbɛtɔ liva mɔkpan e ɖo flin tɔn mɛ lɛ e sin ku
jaan nuɖexlɛmɛ hwenɛnu ɔ mɛ bi sixu suxo bo ɖɔ xo elɔ lɛ e mɛsɛdo pɔlu ɖɔ e ku fitɛ ɖuɖeji towe ɖe
ku fitɛ acɛ towe e a nɔ do wa nu nyanya na ɔ ɖe kɔlɛntinu lɛ
e ɖyɔ nyikɔ lɛ
nuɖuɖu kpo sin kpo sɔ nɔ jlo e a
enyi e sa ami e nɔ nyi glycerine e do nu tɔn lobo sɔ avɔxwɛ fifa ɖe tɛ nyi nukɔngɛngɛn tɔn ji ɔ azinzɔnnɔ ɔ sixu vo
jlo ɖiɖo ba nɔ eɖokponɔ alo nɔ kpɔ xa mɛ klewun ɖe
blo bonu xa ɔ mɛ ni nɔ xwii
amlɔ didɔ magbokɔ
sugbaja xixo
ma ɖo sugbaja e xo wɛ e ɖe e te o e nyɔ wa ɔ ɖɔ xo kpo gbe fifa kpo lobo lɛ na ɛ ganjɛwu
ayi tɔn nɔ wlu
ðɔ nyikɔ towe lobo ɖoto e kpo sisi kpo e na bo tlɛ ci ɖɔ ayi tɔn wlu ɔ nɛ
e na nɔ yi nukanmɛ do wu bo na nɔ do wu
blo bonu azinzɔnnɔ ɔ kpo zan tɔn kpo ni nɔ mimɛ ji lee e byɔ gbɔn e
gbɔjɛ ɔ nɔ huzu
gbɔjɛ tɔn e ɖo nu ɖɔ wɛ e sixu nyi jɔhɔn kpowun bo ɖo vɛgokan tɔn e ko tuntun e mɛ gbɔn wɛ
gbɔjɛ ɔ sɔ nɔ yi do a
enyi e sɔ ta tɔn do ji kpo kɔɖonu ɖe kpo ɔ e sixu bɔ gbɔjɛ tɔn na din ganji
sinmɛ agbaza ɔ tɔn nɔ huzu
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nu nɔ nyi mɔ ɖo agbaza ɔ nɔ sɛ kanjɔ do hun ɔ mɛ ba do wujɔnu agbaza ɔ tɔn taji lɛ
fi e e gosin e the metropolitan hospice of greater new york
a ka sixu xa biblu do ebleegbe mɛ a
vlafonu wɛ e na nyi
boya a tlɛ mɔ ebleegbe sin biblu ɖe kpɔn gbeɖe lɔ a
e ɖo mɔ co biblu towe e ɖo asi towe e sixu lɛ su nukun towe mɛ hwenu e a na kplɔn nu do akɔwe xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn e nɔ nyi elias hutter e kpo biblu ebleegbe tɔn we e e ɖetɔn lɛ e kpo wu e
e ji elias hutter ɖo ɖo gorlitz toxo kpɛvi ɖe wɛ bo sɛkpɔ dogbo e allemagne ɖo xa pologne kpo republique tcheque kpo ɖo egbe e
hutter kplɔn zanzanhweji azii tɔn sin gbe lɛ ɖo kplɔnyiji alavɔ ɖe lutheran university ɖo iena
xwe kpowun jɛn e ɖo bɔ e sɔ ɛ mɛsi kplɔnyiji alavɔ tɔn bɔ e na kplɔn ebleegbe mɛ ɖo leipzig
ðo e hɛn huzuhuzu lɛ wa ɖo nukplɔnmɛ linu wutu ɔ e wa hun wemaxɔmɛ ɖe ɖo nuremberg bɔ wemaxɔmɛvi lɛ sixu kplɔn ebleegbe glɛkigbe latɛɛngbe kpo allemagne gbe kpo ɖo xwe ɛnɛ vlamɛ
e sixu wa nu mɔhun ɖe ɖo wemaxɔmɛ alo kplɔnyiji alavɔ ɖe ɖo hwenɛnu a
biblu ebleegbe tɔn e hutter ɖetɔn ɖo e sin akpa
ðo ɔ hutter ɖe akpaxwe biblu tɔn e e nɔ ylɔ ɖo kpaa mɛ ɖɔ alɛnuwema xoxo ɔ e tɔn do ebleegbe mɛ
xota e ɖo wema enɛ ji e wɛ nyi derekh ha kodesh bɔ e ɖe sin ezayii mɛ bɔ tinmɛ tɔn nyi ali mimɛ ɔ
nuwlanwlan lɛ nyɔ ɖɛkpɛ sɔmɔ bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu lɛ bi wɛ ɖe ɖɛkpɛ wema elɔ tɔn xlɛ
amɔ nu e zɔn bɔ biblu enɛ xɔ akwɛ hugan e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nyi azɔwanu ɖagbe ɖe bɔ wemaxɔmɛvi lɛ sixu zan do kplɔn ebleegbe
bo na do mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu e wu biblu ebleegbe tɔn hutter tɔn nyɔ zan sɔmɔ e mɛ ɔ mi nu mi ni ɖɔ xo do wuvɛ e nukplɔntɔ ɖe nɔ mɔ hwenu e e ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ba xa biblu do ebleegbe mɛ e we ji
nukɔntɔn ɔ wekwin lɛ nɔ gbɔn vo bo lɛ ma do mɛ a bɔ wegɔ ɔ wekwin kpɛvi e ɖo bibɛmɛ kpo fifonu xokwin lɛ tɔn kpo e nɔ zɔn bɔ e nɔ vɛwu bonu e na xokwin dodo lɛ wu
ði kpɔndewu ɔ mi ni lin tamɛ do xokwin ebleegbe tɔn נפש e nɔ xa ɖɔ nephesh bɔ tinmɛ tɔn nyi mɛ alo lindɔn e ji
ðo ezekiyɛli mɛ ɔ e gɔ wekwin ה ha na ɖo bibɛmɛ bɔ tinmɛ tɔn nyi ɔ bɔ xokwin hukple ɔ blo הנפש hannephesh alo lindɔn ɔ
nu mɛ e ebleegbe xixa ma ma do a e ɖe ɔ xokwin הנפש hannephesh sixu ci nu e gbɔn vo tawun nu נפש nephesh e ɖɔhun
bo na do wemaxɔmɛvi tɔn lɛ ɔ hutter zan wlɛnwin wemazinzin tɔn bunɔ ɖe e wɛ nyi wekwin ebleegbe tɔn tlitli lɛ kpo ee ma tli a lɛ e kpo zinzan
e nɔ zin xokwin dodo lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo bɔ wekwin yetɔn lɛ nɔ tli
wlɛnwin vlɛkɛsɛɛ enɛ zɔn bɔ e bɔwu nu wemaxɔmɛvi lɛ bonu ye na xokwin dodo ebleegbe tɔn lɛ wu bɔ enɛ ye ɖo gbe ɔ kplɔnkplɔn mɛ
les saintes ecritures traduction du monde nouveau avec notes et references zan wlɛnwin mɔhun ɖo tinmɛ e ɖo do lɛ e mɛ
xokwin dodo lɛ nɔ tli bɔ wekwin ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo bibɛmɛ kpo fifonu kpo lɛ e nɔ tli a
fɔtoo e ɖo aga lɛ e xlɛ wlɛnwin e e zan ɖo biblu ebleegbe tɔn hutter tɔn mɛ ɖo ezekiyɛli mɛ e kpo ee bible avec notes et references zan ɖo wemafɔ ɖokpo ɔ mɛ e kpo
hutter lɛ zin wema e e nɔ ylɔ ɖo kpaa mɛ ɖɔ alɛnuwema yɔyɔ ɔ e do gbe mɛ
e ɖe wema enɛ tɔn ɖo nuremberg ɖo bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ polyglotte de nuremberg
hutter jlo na sɔ akpaxwe biblu tɔn e e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e sin lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ ebleegbe tɔn do polyglotte de nuremberg ɔ mɛ
amɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi emi na bo tlɛ jlo na zan akwɛ wɔbuwɔbu do lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ ebleegbe tɔn enɛ mɛ ɔ dobanunu emitɔn na nyi vɔtɔ
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi na lilɛ alɛnuwema yɔyɔ ɔ sin glɛkigbe mɛ do ebleegbe mɛ emiɖesunɔ
hutter jo azɔ ɖevo bi do lobo fo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ sin azɔ ɔ ɖo xwe ɖokpo kpowun vlamɛ
nɛ do akpaxwe biblu tɔn e e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ bɔ hutter ɖetɔn do ebleegbe mɛ e ka nyɔ sɔ
nu e akɔwe eblee xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn franz delitzsch wlan e wu lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ ebleegbe tɔn e e ɖetɔn e xlɛ ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ gbe ɔ mɛ ganji nu ka nɔ yawu nyi mɔ a
hutter jɛ dɔkun ɖo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛzɔ tɔn wu a ɖo wema tɔn lɛ ɖisa ganji a wutu
e ɖo mɔ co azɔ e e wa e wa ɖagbe taji e ma sixu bu kpɔn gbeɖe a e ɖe
ði kpɔndewu ɔ william robertson vɔ alɔnuwema yɔyɔ ebleegbe tɔn e e ɖetɔn e jlaɖo bo vɔ zin ɖo bɔ ɖo ɔ richard caddick lɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ
ðo hutter zan glɛkigbe dodo ɔ do blo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ tɔn na wutu ɔ e lilɛ tɛnmɛ nyikɔ kurios aklunɔ kpo theos mawu kpo do jehovah יהוה jhvh ɖo fi e e ɖe wemafɔ lɛ sin akpaxwe biblu tɔn e e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ lɛ e alo fi e e mɔ ɖɔ jehovah do gesi wɛ e ɖe lɛ e e
nu taji ɖe wɛ nu enɛ nyi ɖo enyi lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ alɔnuwema yɔyɔ ɔ tɔn gege na bo ma tlɛ zan nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɖesu ɔ a ɔ lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ hutter tɔn blo mɔ bo ɖexlɛ ɖɔ e ɖo na vɔ nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɔ sɔ ɖo tɛn tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e mɛ
hweɖebunu e a na mɔ nyikɔ mawu tɔn jehovah ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e mɛ alo ɖo tinmɛ e ɖo do ɖo bible avec notes et references mɛ e ɔ nɔ flin azɔ e elias hutter wa e kpo biblu tɔn ebleegbe tɔn nukunɖeji lɛ kpo
kpɔn tinmɛ wegɔ e ɖo do ɖo ezekiyɛli mɛ e kpo appendice kpo ɖo bible avec notes et references mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ akɔwe ɖevo lɛ ko ɖe lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ alɛnuwema yɔyɔ ɔ tɔn tɔn do ebleegbe mɛ jɛ nukɔn
mɛ enɛ lɛ ɖokpo wɛ nyi simon atoumanos e nyi yɛhwenɔ byzantin ɖe ɖo mɔ e
mɛ ɖevo nɔ nyi oswald schreckenfuchs akɔwe allemagne tɔn ɖe wɛ ɖo mɔ
wekwin ɛnɛ e nɔte nu nyikɔ mimɛ mawu tɔn jehovah ɖo ebleegbe mɛ e xa sin ɖisixwe wa yi amyɔxwe
mi ka sixu ganjɛwu nugbo ɖɔ akpa e mawu do lɛ e bi na wa jɛnu a
jezu ganjɛ enɛ wu bɔ nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ hɛn toɖoetɔ lɛ sin nuɖiɖi lido
mi ni lin tamɛ kpɔn do kpɔndewu e e na ɖo mawuxoɖiɖɔ so ji tɔn tɔn e ɖo matie mɛ e ji e ɖɔ ðo ma ɖɔ nugbo nu mi enyi jinukunsin kpodo ayikungban kpo ma ko vɔ a ɔ wekwin kpɛvi titi ɖokpo gee ɖo sɛn lɛ mɛ na hwe sin wɛ kaka cobonu nu lɛ bi na sɔgbe a
wekwin kpɛvi bi e ɖo wekwin ebleegbe tɔn lɛ mɛ e wɛ nyi י yod bo nyi wekwin nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖo wekwin ɛnɛ ɖeɖee nɔte nu nyikɔ mimɛ mawu tɔn jehovah e mɛ
gɔ nu xokwin kpo wekwin ɖeɖee ɖo sɛn mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo ɔ sɛnkplɔnmɛtɔ lɛ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo mɔ ɖɔ wekwin kpɛvi titi ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo taji tawun
ðiɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe ɖɔ jinukunsin kpo ayikungban kpo na ɖibla wa yi hu ɖɔ goflɛmɛ sɛn ɔ tɔn kpɛvi titi ɖe ni gɔn jijɛnu
amɔ mawuxowema ɔ na jiɖe mi ɖɔ jinukunsin kpo ayikungban kpo e mɔ wɛ mi ɖe lɛ e na kpo ɖo te kaka sɔyi
ðɛhan enɛ wu ɔ xogbe nukunɖeji enɛ lɛ xlɛ ɖɔ goflɛmɛ sɛn ɔ tɔn kpɛvi bi ɔ kun na gɔn jijɛnu o
jehovah mawu ka nɔ keya nu goflɛmɛ kpɛvi lɛ a
ganji
mi ni lin tamɛ do nu elɔ ji e ɖɔ nu izlayɛli vi hwexonu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ ye kun ɖo na gba lɛngbɔvi dindinwayixwe tɔn ɔ sin xu lɛ ɖebu o
tintɔn vlafo goflɛmɛ kpɛvi ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi
ye ka mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu e wu ye ma ɖo na gba xu lɛ ɖebu a e mɛ a
ye sixu nɔ ma tuun
amɔ jehovah mawu tuun ɖɔ goflɛmɛ enɛ nyi ɖe bo na jɛnu hwenu e e na doya nu mɛsiya ɔ ɖo yatin ji bo na hu i e e ka na gba xu tɔn lɛ ɖebu a ðɛhan jaan
etɛ xo jezu tɔn lɛ ka kplɔn mi
mi lɔ sixu ɖeji mlɛmlɛ ɖɔ jehovah sin akpa lɛ bi na jɛnu kaka jɛ goflɛmɛ gudogudo tɔn lɛ bi ji
ganjɛwu e wu agbɔn ɖe e ɖe wɛ xokwin ebleegbe tɔn kpɛvi bi ɔ na mɛ
wekwin kpɛvi bi e ɖo wekwin glɛkigbe tɔn lɛ mɛ e wɛ nyi iota bo nyi nu ɖokpo ɔ kpo ebleegbe tɔn י yod ɔ kpo
ðo ebleegbe mɛ wɛ e wlan mɔyizi sɛn ɔ do ɖo bibɛmɛ wutu ɔ e ci ɖɔ wekwin ebleegbe tɔn ɔ xo ɖɔ wɛ jezu na ko ɖe
praslin ɖo seychelles fi e ahwangan sunvinɔ gordon mɔ jikpa edɛni tɔn eyɛtɔn ɖe ɖo e
palaɖisi
alɔnuwema tomɛyiyi tɔn e nɔ ɖo sinmɛ gege lɛ e sin nuxwlemɛ lɛ sixu dɔn mi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi na do jɔmɛhun yi palaɖisi enyii ee ɖo fi linlin ɖe e mɛ bo na yi gbɔjɛ lobo wɔn ya nu linkpɔn kpo wuvɛ mitɔn lɛ kpo bi
amɔ lee mi bi tuun gbɔn e ɔ hwenu e mi na lɛkɔ wa xwe e ɔ lee nu lɛ ɖe gbɔn bɔ mi yi e jɛn ye na kpo ɖe
e ɖo mɔ co lee akpakpa nɔ sɔ mɛ gbɔn do palaɖisi wu e jiwu tawun
mi sixu gɔn nu elɔ lɛ kanbyɔ miɖee a palaɖisi enyii ɔ lɛ nyi nu ɖevo hu dlɔ ɖe kpowun wɛ a
enyi mɔ wɛ ɔ etɛwu akpakpa ka nɔ sɔ mɛ
nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɔ palaɖisi xo ɔ ko ɖu ayi mɛ nu mɛ lɛ
mɛ gege tiin bɔ xo e biblu ɖɔ bo ɖɔ ɖɔ jikpa ɖokpo ɖo edɛni ɖo zanzanhweji wa ji e wɛ fɔn jlo yetɔn nyite
etɛwu jikpa enɛ ka dɔn mɛ sɔmɔ
tan ɔ ɖɔ nu mi do jehovah mawu wu ɖɔ e blo bɔ atin alɔkpa alɔkpa e nyɔ kpɔn bɔ sinsɛn yetɔn nyɔ ɖu lɛ wu ɖo jikpa ɔ mɛ
fi ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ e nyɔ nɔ e ɖe wɛ jikpa enɛ nyi
nu e lɛ dɔn mɛ hu bi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ atin e sinsɛn tɔn nɔ na gbɛ mɛ ɔ wu ɖo jikpa ɔ tɛntin bibɛmɛ
gɔ na ɔ tan bibɛmɛ tɔn ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ tɔ ɛnɛ nɔ sa sin jikpa ɔ mɛ
tɔsisa enɛ lɛ we tiin bɔ e lɛ tuun ye egbe ye wɛ nyi tigli kpo eflati kpo
bibɛmɛ tɔ we enɛ lɛ nɔ gbɔn fi e e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ irak egbe bo ɖo pɛsi hwexonu tɔn mɛ e lobo nɔ sa do golfe persique mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ ɖo aca pɛsinu lɛ tɔn mɛ
avɔ pɛsinu lɛ tɔn xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn ɖe ɖo nu xoxo sɛxwetɛn e e tɛ alɔlyɛnzɔwiwa sin nu lɛ ɖo ɖo philadelphie ɖo pennsylvanie etats unis e bo xlɛ jikpa e e mɛ do lɛlɛ do e ɖe bɔ e ɖe atin lɛ kpo folowa lɛ kpo do na
xogbe e pɛsinu lɛ nɔ zan nu jikpa e e mɛ do lɛlɛ do e sin tinmɛ lɛvɔ nyi palaɖisi bɔ nu e e ɖe do avɔ ɔ mɛ lɛ e nyi xlɛ mɔjɛmɛ e biblu na do jikpa edɛni tɔn ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ ɔ wu lɛ e tɔn
nugbo ɔ gbe gege kpo aca gege kpo mɛ wɛ e ko vɔ tan palaɖisi tɔn ɔ kpi ɖe gbɔn gbɛ ɔ mɛ
hwenu e xwedo lɛ sɛ tɛn yi ayikungban ɔ sin akpa ɖevo lɛ xwe e ɔ ye nɔ hɛn tan dodo ɔ e e vɔ kpi e ɖe lɛ yi dɔn bɔ xwe ɖo xwe ji jɛ wɛ ɔ nuɖiɖi kpo xɛxo ɖeɖee gbakpe xa ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo nɔ caka ɖo kpɔ xa
kaka jɛ egbe ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ yawu ylɔ fi ɖeɖee nyɔ ɖɛkpɛ tawun lɛ e ɖɔ palaɖisi
nudobatɔ ɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi mɔ fi e palaɖisi e bu e nɔ e
ði kpɔndewu ɔ hwenu e ahwangan sunvinɔ grande bretagne tɔn charles gordon yi seychelles ɖo e ɔ tɔdo e e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ vallee de mai nyi gu gbɛ ɔ tɔn patrimoine mondial sin nɔtɛn ɖe din e sin ɖɛkpɛ jiwu ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ sɔmɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ e wɛ nyi jikpa edɛni tɔn ɔ
ðo xwe kanweko ɔ mɛ ɔ hwenu e tɔjihunkuntɔ italie nu christophe colomb yi tɔtɛntinto hispaniola tɔn ee nyi republique dominicaine kpo haiti kpo din e mɛ e ɔ e kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ jikpa edɛni tɔn ɔ mɔ wɛ emi ka lɛvɔ ɖe a ji
ðokpo bo nyi beatus de liebana xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn tɔn bo tiin sɔmɔ a
ðo ɖiɖe to tɔn enɛ sin ta nu ɔ e xa fi ɖe bo ɖe palaɖisi ɖo tɛntin tɔn
tɔ ɛnɛ nɔ sa sin zwe tɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ji ye wɛ nyi tigli eflati pison kpo geon kpo bɔ e lin ɖɔ ye nɔte nu sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn e gbakpe wɛkɛzo ɛnɛ lɛ bi mɛ e
ðiɖe mɔhun lɛ xlɛ ɖɔ enyi e ma tlɛ sɔ tuun fi e palaɖisi dodo ɔ nɔ e a ɔ lee e ci e kpo ɖo mɛ dɔn wɛ kaka jɛ egbe
e tuun xo lomilomi wlantɔ angleterre nu xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn john milton ɖo xo lomilomi le paradis perdu e e wlan e wu e jinjɔn tan bibɛmɛ tɔn e ɖɔ xo do hwɛ e adamu hu bɔ e nya ɛ sin edɛni mɛ e ji
e ɖɔ xo do gbɛ mavɔmavɔ ɖo ayikungban ji sin akpa e e do nu gbɛtɔ lɛ e wu bo ɖɔ enɛ gudo ɔ ayikungban ɔ bi na huzu palaɖisi
enɛ wu ɔ milton wlan kpedenu tɔn e xota tɔn nyi le paradis reconquis e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn e bu e nyi nuɖe bɔ gbɛtɔ lɛ yi wan na tawun ɖo hwenuxo mɛ
bɔ etɛwu mɛ lɛ ka wɔn ya na din
nu taji e wu wɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ lee mapping paradise ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ sinsɛn nukplɔnmɛtɔ lɛ tuun gaan bo wɔn ya nu fi e palaɖisi nɔ e sin xo ɔ
e kplɔn amisayitɔ gege ɖɔ jixwe wɛ nyi fi gudo tɔn e ye na yi nɔ gbɛ ɖe e le e kun nyi ɖo palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn ɖe mɛ o
e ɖo mɔ co biblu ɖɔ ɖo ðɛhan mɛ ɖɔ ayikungban ɔ na nyi hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ tɔn bɔ ye na nɔ ji kaka sɔyi
jehovah mawu e ɖo palaɖisi tɔn ee bu e ɖɔ emi na lɛvɔ dɔn wa
gbɔn nɛ e
daniyɛli ðo axɔsuɖuto enɛ sin acɛkpikpa glɔ ɔ jlo mawu tɔn e kunkpla palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn e na nyi wiwa
mawu ko sɔ mɛ nu gbeyiɖɔ ezayii ɖɔ lee nu lɛ na ci gbɔn ɖo palaɖisi e sin akpa e do e mɛ e xoxo bɔ hannyihannyi kpo hwɛgbe kpo ɖeɖee ɖo nu wa do gbɛtɔ lɛ wu wɛ egbe e ɖe sɔ na ɖe a
ezayii mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu we ɖɔ hwi ni ze cɛju klewun ɖe do xa wemafɔ enɛ lɛ ɖo biblu towe ɖesu mɛ
mɔ wiwa na na jiɖe we do nu e mawu sɔ nu gbɛtɔ tonusetɔ lɛ e wu
mɛ e na nɔ gbɛ hwenɛnu lɛ e na ɖu palaɖisi e adamu hɛn bu e sin vivi nu yetɔn na nyɔ mawu nukunmɛ nuɖexlɛmɛ
nɛ mi ka wa gbɔn bo tuun ɖɔ palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn sin nukunɖiɖo ɔ nyi nujɔnu bo kun nyi dlɔ o
ðo biblu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ jixwe ɔ jixwe mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖokponɔ gee tɔn wɛ loɔ e na ayikungban ɔ gbɛtɔ lɛ
palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn sin nukunɖiɖo na gbla a ɖo mawu ko do gbɛ mavɔmavɔ ɔ sin akpa cobɔ gbɛ ɔ wa tiin e ka nɔ ɖo adingban a

biblu ɖɔ
mi mɛ e nɔ ze hlɔnhlɔn mitɔn do blo nu e e zɔn mi lɛ bo nɔ do ɖexlɛ ɖɔ emi setonu lɛ mi mi kpa susu ðɛhan
xota e ðo akpa ɔ ji e wɛnsagun lɛ etɛ biblu ka ðɔ do ye wu
aklunɔzangbe hwelɛkɔ gbe ɖokpo ɔ kenneth kpo filomena kpo e nɔ nɔ curacao e yi ba asu kpo asi kpo e ye nɔ kplɔn biblu xa e ɖe kpɔn
kenneth ɖɔ hwenu e mi wa e ɔ hɔn ɔ ɖo susu bɔ mɔto ɔ ɖo finɛ a
amɔ nuɖe ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ ma ylɔ nyɔnu ɔ sin alokan
amɔ ee e wu tlolo ɖɔ kenneth kpo filomena kpo ɖo kɔxo e ɔ e wa hɔn ɔ kɔn lobo ylɔ ye do xɔmɛ
ye wu tlolo ɖɔ avi ya wɛ e ɖe
ee kenneth jɛ ɖɛ xo ji bo na do bɛ biblu kplɔnkplɔn ɔ e ɔ nyɔnu ɔ lɛvɔ bɛ avi
enɛ wu ɔ kenneth kpo filomena kpo kan nu e ɖo jijɛ wɛ e byɔ ɛ kpo xomɛnyinyɔ kpo
nyɔnu ɔ tinmɛ ɖɔ emi ɖo nu sɔ wɛ ba hu emiɖee hwelɛkɔ enɛ lobo ɖo mɔ wlan nu asu emitɔn wɛ hwenu e alokan emitɔn ɖɔ nu e bɔ emi gbɔ bo nɔte
e ɖɔ nu ye ɖɔ emi ɖo linkpɔnzɔn jɛ wɛ enɛ wu ɔ ye sɔ linlin biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ do do gbɔ
wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ enɛ hwlɛn gbɛ tɔn gan
kenneth ɖɔ mi doku nu jehovah nu jo e e jo mi do bɔ mi nyɔnu enɛ e flu e bo lɛ doku tawun nu wɛnsagun alo gbigbɔ mimɛ tɔn e e zan vlafo do sisɛ mi bɔ mi tɛkan enɛ e
kenneth kpo filomena kpo sin hwɛ ka jɔ bɔ ye na ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu gbɔn wɛnsagun ɖe ji alo zan gbigbɔ mimɛ alo hlɔnhlɔn tɔn do ɖo ninɔmɛ ɔ mɛ a
alo kan e kenneth tɛ e ɔ nu kpe do nu nu kpowun wɛ a
mi sixu kanɖeji a
amɔ nu e mi tuun e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mawu nɔ zan wɛnsagun tɔn lɛ do gbɛtɔ lɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ði kpɔndewu ɔ biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu zan wɛnsagun ɖe do xlɛ ali klisanwun wɛnɖagbejlatɔ filipu bonu e na axɔsuzɔwatɔ etiopiinu e ɖo alixlɛmɛ ba wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ɖe mɛsɛdo

wɛnsagun gbejinɔtɔ lɛ nɔ nɔ jixwe lobo nɔ yi mawu gɔn tlɔlɔ luki matie jaan
hweɖelɛnu wa yi ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ sɔ ninɔmɛ gbɛtɔ tɔn bo wa wa azɔ e mawu zɔn ye lɛ e ɖo ayikungban ji bɔ hwenu e ye fo azɔ gudo e ɔ ye lɛ huzu wɛnsagun hwɛɖɔtɔ lɛ
ye nɔ bo nɔ ji vi a
biblu ɖɔ xo do gbɛtɔ lɛ kpodo wɛnsagun mawu tɔn lɛ kpo sin gbe wu bɔ e xlɛ ɖɔ nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ lɔ ɖo gbe yetɔn lobo nɔ ɖɔ xo

wɛnsagun wɔbliwɔva bɔya liva mɔkpan wɛ tiin
daniyɛli nwt nuɖexlɛmɛ
wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn tawun hu gbɛtɔ lɛ bo lɛ ɖo nunywɛ hu ye flafla tɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wezun e ye nɔ do sɛ tɛn na e jiwu tawun bo zɛ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ gbɛtɔ tɔn wu ðɛhan daniyɛli
wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo nunywɛ kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo tawun co ye ɖo dogbo bɔ nuɖe lɛ tiin bɔ ye tuun a matie piyɛɛ
e blo wɛnsagun lɛ bɔ ye gbɔn vo nu yeɖee ɖo jijɔ mawu tɔn lɛ bo lɛ ɖo mɛɖesusininɔ
enɛ wu ɔ gbɛtɔ lɛ ɖɔhun ɔ ye sixu jlo bo wa nu ɖagbe alo nu nyanya
e blawu ɖɔ wɛnsagun ɖe lɛ jlo bo fɔn gu do mawu ji judi

matie amɔ ɖiɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe ɖɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo wɛnsagun xɛnyaɖomɛjitɔ ɖe a loɔ ɖiɖɔ wɛ e ɖe kpowun ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu wɛnsagun lɛ titewungbe tɔn

e da sunnu nukɔntɔn ɔ adamu kpo nyɔnu nukɔntɔn ɔ ɛvu kpo nɔ zaan e ɔ nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn e ma ɖo blɔ a e ɖe zan mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn nyi do bo dɔn gufinfɔn wa ayikungban ji

amɔ ɖo gufinfɔn tɔn gudo ɔ biblu ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ sataan bɔ tinmɛ tɔn nyi gbeklanxamɛtɔ bo lɛ ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ awovi bɔ tinmɛ tɔn nyi jidomɛtɔ ka sɔgbe mɔ matie
e blawu ɖɔ gufinfɔn do mawu ji ɔ kun ko vɔ ɖo finɛ o
ðo nɔwee hwenu ɔ wɛnsagun ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ e ɖɔ ye mɛ nabi e wɛ e a lobɔ ye jo nɔtɛn yeɖesunɔ tɔn do ɖo xwedo jixwe tɔn mawu tɔn mɛ
ye wa ayikungban ɔ ji bo sɔ gbɛtɔ gbaza lobo zan gbɛ blibli bo zɛ sin linlin e wu e da ye e li ji judi bibɛmɛ piyɛɛ
etɛ ka jɛ do wɛnsagun nyanya enɛ lɛ wu
hwenu e mawu sɔ sin do vɔ gbɛ ɔ do ɖe nu kwiji sin ayikungban ɔ ji e ɔ ye ɖyɔ agbaza bo lɛ huzu nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ
amɔ mawu sɔ lɔn nu wɛnsagun enɛ lɛ e wa winnyanu e lɛkɔ yi nɔtɛn yeɖesunɔ tɔn a
loɔ e glɔn ye do zinflu gbigbɔ tɔn e nyi ninɔmɛ winnya tɔn e ɖe mɛ
judi piyɛɛ awovi enɛ lɛ jlo bo byɔ sataan awovi sin acɛ mɛ eyɛ wɛ nyi yɛ nyanya lɛ xɔsu bo nɔ sɔ wɛnsagun weziza tɔn sin ninɔmɛ matie kɔlɛntinu lɛ
biblu kplɔn mɛ ɖɔ e ɖo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn e nyi acɛkpikpa jixwe tɔn ɖe bɔ mɛsiya ɔ e ayi ɖo
bɔ do nu nukunɖeji enɛ e jɛ e wu ɔ e nya sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo sin jixwe bo glɔn ye do ayikungban ɔ ji
nunyanyawiwa e vun kan e kpo nublibliwiwa e tlɛn asa bo vunbla ayikungban ɔ bi e kpo nyi kunnuɖenu ɖe ɖɔ ye ɖo hlɔn ba wɛ bo ɖo mɛ lɛ dɔn xwe ku wɛ nuɖexlɛmɛ
amɔ nublibliwiwa kpo dakaxixo gannaganna kpo e fɔn bo ɖo jijɛji wɛ e xlɛ ɖɔ acɛkpikpa dakaxixo tɔn yetɔn sin vivɔnu ko ɖo kɛnnɛkɛnnɛ
zaanɖe din ɔ nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn nyanya enɛ lɛ sin xo na fo
enyi axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn kpacɛ do palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn nu nu xwe gudo ɔ e na jo yɛ nyanya enɛ lɛ do nu hwenu klewun ɖe bɔ ye na tɛn gbɛtɔ lɛ kpɔn azɔn gudogudo tɔn
nu a jlo na ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖevo lɛ do axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn wu hun kpɔn wemata wema etɛ biblu ka sixu kplɔn mi
tɔn kunnuɖetɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ ɖetɔn
e lɛ ɖo www jw org ji
xota e ðo akpa ɔ ji e wɛnsagun lɛ etɛ biblu ka ðɔ do ye wu
nu gbɛtɔ lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu wɛnsagun gbejinɔtɔ lɛ tawun bɔ ye nɔ lɛ ɖo alɔ ɖo jlo jehovah tɔn wiwa mɛ titewungbe tɔn
hwenu e mawu ɖo ayikungban ɔ e ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo kpɔ bo ɖo han ji wɛ bo ɖo xo su wɛ kpo xomɛhunhun kpo
jɔbu sin bibɛmɛ ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ jlo na mɔ nu jɛ wɛn tɔn e kunkpla nu ɖeɖee na jɛ ɖo ayikungban ji ɖo sɔgudo lɛ e wu piyɛɛ
biblu xlɛ ɖɔ bo na do wa jlo mawu tɔn ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ cyɔn alɔ mawu sɛntɔ nugbo lɛ ji ɖo ba ɖe mɛ ɖo hweɖelɛnu
hwenu e jehovah ɖo kun na su do nu toxo nyanya sodɔmu kpo gomɔɔ kpo wɛ e ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ nujlɔjlɔwatɔ lɔti kpo xwedo tɔn kpo bɔ ye hɔn bibɛmɛ
hwenu e e ɖo kuhwɛ nu dɔnkpɛvu eblee atɔn bo bɛ ye kɔn nyi myɔ ɖaxo ɖe mɛ ɖo babilɔnu hwexonu tɔn mɛ e ɔ mawu sɛ wɛnsagun tɔn do bɔ e wa hwlɛn mɛsɛntɔ tɔn lɛ gan daniyɛli
ee nya nujlɔjlɔwatɔ daniyɛli nɔ kinnikinni domɛ bɔ ayi hɔn e ɔ e tinmɛ ɖɔ emi gan ɖo mawu sɛ wɛnsagun tɔn do bɔ e wa su kinnikinni lɛ sin nu daniyɛli
hweɖelɛnu ɔ wɛnsagun mawu tɔn lɛ ɖo azɔ agun klisanwun tɔn bibɛmɛ tɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ hwenu e mɔ wiwa ɖo dandan bonu linlin jehovah tɔn ni jɛnu e
wɛnsagun ɖe hun gankpa ɖe sin hɔn lɛ nu mɛsɛdo lɛ bo ɖegbe nu ye ɖɔ ye ni gbɛkan do wɛnɖagbejijla ɔ nu ɖo tɛmpli ɔ mɛ mɛsɛdo
wɛnsagun ɖe ɖɔ nu wɛnɖagbejlatɔ filipu ɖɔ e ni yi gbetotlo li e gosin jeluzalɛmu yi gaza e ji bo ɖɔ mawuxo nu etiopiinu e wa yi sɛn mawu ɖo jeluzalɛmu bo lɛkɔ e ɖe mɛsɛdo
hwenu e gan ɔ xo nu mawu bɔ mɛ e ma nyi jwifu a lɛ e na huzu klisanwun e ɔ wɛnsagun mawu tɔn ɖe tɔn do ahwangan hlɔmanu kɔnɛyi ji ɖo numimɔ ɖe mɛ bo ɖɔ ɖɔ e ni ylɔ mɛsɛdo piyɛɛ wa xwe tɔn gbe mɛsɛdo
hwenu e mɛsɛdo piyɛɛ ɖo gankpa mɛ e ɔ wɛnsagun ɖe tɔn do ji tɔn lobo kpla ɛ sin gankpa ɔ mɛ mɛsɛdo
mawu sɔ nɔ zan wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo nujiwu linu do mɛ lɛ lee biblu ɖexlɛ gbɔn e ɖo egbe bonu kunnuɖenu ɖe xlɛ a
matie a ka tuun ɖɔ ahwanvu klisu tɔn lɛ ɖo azɔ enɛ wa wɛ ɖo alixlɛmɛ wɛnsagun lɛ tɔn glɔ a
wɛnsagun lɛ nɔ bɔ e nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbɔn gbɛ ɔ bi mɛ
wema nuɖexlɛmɛ tɔn ɖexlɛ ɖɔ wɛnsagun lɛ na ɖo alɔ do gbɛtɔ lɛ wɛ ɖo ayikungban ɔ bi ji bonu ye na kplɔn nu do jehovah mawu kpo linlin e e ɖo nu gbɛtɔ lɛ e kpo wu
nuɖexlɛmɛ nu e nɔ jɛ egbe lɛ e gege nyi kunnuɖenu ɖɔ wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo gudo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ jijla gbɔn gbɛ ɔ bi mɛ sin azɔ ɔ
nugbo ɔ enyi hwɛhutɔ ɖe jo hwɛ tɔn lɛ do bo lɛkɔ wa jehovah gɔn ɔ wɛnsagun mawu tɔn lɛ nɔ luki
etɛ ka na jɛ hwenu e wɛnɖagbejijlazɔ ɔ na fo e
enɛ gudo ɔ ahwangɔnu jixwe tɔn lɛ na nɔ gudo nu jezu klisu axɔsu axɔsu lɛ tɔn ɔ bo na fun ahwan e ye na fun ɖo mawu nubiwukpetɔ ɔ sin azan ɖaxo ɔ gbe bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ haamagedɔni e
nuɖexlɛmɛ wɛnsagun hlɔnhlɔnnɔ lɛ na gɔ nu aklunɔ jezu bo na dɔn to nu mɛ e ma nɔ setonu nu wɛnɖagbe e ɖɔ xo do aklunɔ mitɔn jezu wu a lɛ tɛsalonikinu lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ kudeji ɖɔ nu towe nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu wɛnsagun lɛ
ye nɔ lin ganjininɔ mɛ e jlo na sɛn mawu lɛ e tɔn tawun bɔ jehovah ko zan ye azɔn gege do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛsɛntɔ tɔn gbejinɔtɔ e ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e bo lɛ cyɔn alɔ ye ji eblee lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn ɖo na wa gbeta taji ɖe kɔn
mi ka na ɖoto wɛnɖagbe e jla wɛ e ɖe lɛlɛ do gbɛ ɔ bi e lobo setonu na a
kunnuɖetɔ jehovah tɔn e ɖo xa towe mɛ lɛ e na hun xomɛ bo kplɔn nu xa we bɔ a na ɖu alɔdo wanyiyinɔ wɛnsagun mawu tɔn hlɔnhlɔnnɔ lɛ tɔn sin le
bo na do ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖevo lɛ do nu e biblu ɖɔ do wɛnsagun gbejinɔtɔ lɛ kpo ee ma nɔ gbeji a lɛ e kpo ji hun kpɔn wemata wema etɛ biblu ka sixu kplɔn mi
tɔn kunnuɖetɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ ɖetɔn
e lɛ ɖo jw org ji
yɔkpɔvu ɖe kpo cukuvi ɖe kpo bocyɔ glɛkinu alo hlɔmanu lɛ tɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn j h m tɔn jɛ xwe kanweko wegɔ h m tɔn
hwenu e jezu dogbo izlayɛli tɔn lɛ gbe ɖokpo bo yi tokpɔn hlɔma tɔn e nɔ nyi silii e mɛ e ɔ nyɔnu glɛkinu ɖe sɛkpɔ ɛ bo ɖɔ e ni do alɔ emi
ðo xosin e jezu na e mɛ ɔ e jlɛ mɛ e ma nyi jwifu a lɛ e do cuku lɛ wu
ðo mɔyizi sɛn ɔ glɔ ɔ e nɔ sɔ cuku lɛ do mɔ kanlin blibli lɛ na
levii vi lɛ amɔ zunzun nyɔnu glɛkinu ɔ kpo mɛ e ma nyi jwifu a lɛ e kpo wɛ jezu ka ɖe a
cɛnnyicɛnnyi ɖe lɔ a
lee jezu tinmɛ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ gbɔn e ɔ nu e gbe nya wɛ e ɖe jɛ nukɔn ɖo hwe enɛ nu e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e na jwifu lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ e zan nujlɛdonuwu ɖe do tinmɛ nu e na ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe e bo ɖɔ nu nyɔnu glɛkinu ɔ ɖɔ e jɛxa bonu e na ze nuɖuɖu yɔkpɔvu lɛ tɔn jo nu cuku lɛ a
matie maki e yi wan nu cuku lɛ tawun ɖo glɛkinu lɛ kpo hlɔmanu lɛ kpo tɛntin bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ ye nɔ nɔ mɛ e ɖo ye lɛ e xwegbe bɔ yɔkpɔvu lɛ nɔ xa ye
enɛ wu ɔ xogbe cuku lɛ ɔ na ko flin nujlɛdonuwu xomɛnyinyɔ kpo wanyiyi tɔn ɖe kpo mɛ
nu e jezu ɖɔ e zɔn bɔ nyɔnu glɛkinu ɔ yi gbe bo ɖɔ nugbo wɛ aklunɔ e ka ɖo mɔ co cuku lɛ nɔ cyan mɛ e ɖo ye lɛ sin nuɖuɖu e nɔ hlɛn kɔn nyi ayi hwenu e e ɖo nu ɖu wɛ ɔ ɖu
jezu kpa nyɔnu ɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi tɔn wu bo gbɔ azɔn nu vi nyɔnu tɔn matie
batoo ɖaxo ɖe sin ɖiɖe ɖo awinnya wu xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn h m tɔn
tɔjihun e sɔ pɔlu xwe italii e ɖo xwi ɖi xa jɔhɔn ɖaxo lɛ wɛ
ðo te ninɔ ɖe hwenu ɔ mɛsɛdo ɔ ɖe we xa mɛ ɖɔ e ni to ɖo mɛ e kpo lɛ e sin yiyi te hwɛ
mɛsɛdo e ka sɔgbe ɖɔ e ni ɖe we mɔhun xa mɛ a
tɔjihunkuntɔ hwexonu tɔn lɛ tuun ɖɔ tɔjihun kunkun gbɔn mɛditɛlanɛɛ xu ɔ ji ɖo sun e mɛ avivɔ nɔ gbɛ ɖe lɛ e nyi awovinu ɖaxo ɖe
ðo vlɔɖowe novembre tɔn kpo mars tɔn kpo vlamɛ ɔ tɔ ji yiyi nɔ glo
amɔ septembre alo octobre mɛ wɛ tomɛyiyi e xo pɔlu ɖɔ e ɖe
nuwlantɔ hlɔmanu vegetius xwe kanweko ɛnɛgɔ h m tɔn tinmɛ do tɔ ji yiyi ɖo xu enɛ ji wu bo ɖɔ sun ɖe lɛ nɔ nyɔ tawun ɖevo lɛ nɔ byɔ nuxokpɔn bɔ ee kpo lɛ e nɔ glo bi
epitome of military science vegetius ɖɔ ɖɔ tɔ ji yiyi sin mai jɛ septembre kun ɖo awovinu ɖebu o amɔ hwenu e ɖo awovinu ɖaxo tawun lɛ e we wɛ nyi sin septembre jɛ novembre kpo ee bɛsin mars jɛ mai e kpo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ pɔlu e nɔ yi tomɛ hwɛhwɛ e na ko tuun nu enɛ lɛ ganji

nyi kpo asi ce tabitha kpo ɖo kunnuɖegbe

e ji mi ðo

tan ce un ði ðɔ mawu ðe tiin a
e ji mi ɖo gletoxo ɖe mɛ ɖo saxe ɖo republique democratique allemande rda tɔn mɛ
